bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性３連ダメージ
bb.name: ギルティーアッシュ

dictionary.description: A knight from the utterly devastated Bariura Empire, he later became one of the Six Heroes. As a cavalry leader's son, from childhood he knew of the empire's wish of unifying the continent. He joined the cavalry at 16 intent on gaining the skills necessary to defeat anything that stood in his way. His talent grew quickly and he was soon considered for promotion.
dictionary.fusion:
I will show you my strength!
Grant me more power!
dictionary.summon:
You, Summoner, who calls
upon my strength. Promise to
me that we will end it all.

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性４連ダメージ
bb.name: グラビティエクリプス

dictionary.description: A knight from the utterly devastated Bariura Empire, he later became one of the Six Heroes. Rumor was he'd be the next cavalry leader, but when he lost to his father, he left his family and the empire. He trained hard, using his anger to hone his skills. He was even able to pierce heavy armor. Rumors of him reached the capital and angered the knights whom he abandoned.
dictionary.evolution:
I needed this power.
Are you able to comprehend
its importance?
dictionary.fusion:
My spear skills have improved!
Can't you tell!?
dictionary.summon:
You intend on keeping me alive?
Then in exchange I dedicate
myself to serving you.

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性４連ダメージ
bb.name: デスヴォートバベル

dictionary.description: A former knight from the utterly devastated Bariura Empire, he later became one of the Six Heroes. He was the strongest in Bariura, but while he was gone, his parents were murdered. Enraged, he went on to mercilessly kill the knights he thought to be responsible. The image of him fighting encouraged the people and frightened the knights.
dictionary.evolution:
I am reborn in rage.
What is it that you desire
more than my power?
dictionary.fusion:
My strength is fueled by anger!
Can you control this power!?
dictionary.summon:
The world should fear me,
for I'm reborn thanks to this
foolish Summoner!

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: ヴァーミリオンタワー

dictionary.description: A former knight from the utterly devastated Bariura Empire, he wielded a giant lance as one of the Six Heroes. He headed to the capital once he found out who had killed his parents in fear of his power. However, the war with the gods soon began. He killed countless gods on his way to face the emperor, earning him even more praise. It is, however, yet unknown as to whether or not he got his revenge.
dictionary.evolution:
The world is a dark place.
Even as time passes, this
does not change.
dictionary.fusion:
My rage has become my strength.
Power of darkness, rain on me!
dictionary.summon:
I'm one with the dark.
I am the knight in the shadows.
Summoner! Seek the dark with me!

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: ブラッディカオス

dictionary.description: A former knight from the utterly devastated Bariura Empire, he wielded a giant lance as one of the Six Heroes. While seeking revenge against the emperor who murdered his parents, he cut down countless gods and was eventually targeted directly by their leader. As the war waged on, Magress survived by absorbing the power of the gods. Taking on their skills as well as their equipment, it was said he took on a form that made him unrecognizable as a human.
dictionary.evolution:
This is my true power!
Let me express to you my anger
through my blade of vengeance!
dictionary.fusion:
This power is all mine!
From god or man, it matters not!
Will you sacrifice yourself for me?
dictionary.summon:
The dark power to absorb all
is exactly the power you need!
Summoner! Consume it all!

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ・最大ＨＰを１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇滅神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力をアップ
sbb.name: ダークイレイザー

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: アビスグルーム

dictionary.description: As his comrades fell at the hands of Narza, Magress fell into quite the predicament himself. Amongst his friends was one who although having previously claimed to hate traitors, sacrificed himself in order to save Magress. Consumed by the rage of vengeance, Magress slaughtered Narza while completely covered in wounds. A lone knight appeared shortly after to relay a message to him. Magress discarded every piece of his heavy armor except for his beloved lance, and though unable to move, challenged the mysterious knight to a duel he couldn't win. As he perished, Magress uttered words of gratitude for being able to die as a knight.
dictionary.evolution:
Vengeance made me strong.
But my friends showed me the right path.
I'll become a legendary knight!
dictionary.fusion:
The overwhelming darkness is powerful.
However, a strong heart able to contain it
is also key.
dictionary.summon:
The pride of a knight.
That should be the source of my power.
But I failed to realize that sooner.

extra skill.desc: 「黒騎槍レオムルグ」を装備時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆確率で防御貫通効果を付与
extra skill.name: 真なる騎士の誇り

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を１００％アップ・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇喰神の力

60016.name: 黒闇の真騎神マグルス

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: ダーケストゲイズ

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な闇属性２２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力を超絶アップ＆１ターン、被ダメージを超絶軽減
ubb.name: ブラックエンド

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性２連ダメージ
bb.name: 奥義・月光

dictionary.description: An other-worldly samurai that appeared in the ruined Bariura Empire. Mifune's katana is different from other swords in Grand Gaia thanks to its superior slashing ability. It cuts amazingly well, and it's said that those cut by it die without feeling pain. There's a famous tale of him refusing an invitation from the emperor by saying, "A fool will never be my master."
dictionary.fusion:
I am in debt to you.
I will not allow my inexperience
to hinder you.
dictionary.summon:
I admire your will.
I am Mifune.
I entrust my katana to you.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の輝き

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性３連ダメージ
bb.name: 奥義・紫電

dictionary.description:
An other-worldly samurai that appeared in the ruined Bariura Empire. He fought in many famous duels with his special katana.
Rumors spread around Grand Gaia and many swordsmen challenged him. His beloved katana awakened its true power during those fights. It was a demonic blade that lusted for human blood. Unable to restrain himself, he in to its power.
dictionary.evolution:
I walk the blood-drenched
path of a samurai.
Is that alright with you?
dictionary.fusion:
A katana relies not just on
strength but also on spirit.
I must train both body and mind!
dictionary.summon:
You knew I use a demon blade?
Then let me share with you
the secret to its power!

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の煌めき

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性４連ダメージ
bb.name: 奥義・極光

dictionary.description: An other-worldly samurai that appeared in the ruined Bariura Empire. His skill sharpened with each battle against the gods, and even whilst on the brink of death it's said he slew a giant dragon in one blow. Despite Mifune dying without returning to his world, he calmly faced death. Vargas, who had crossed blades with him before, said, "He found the death he desired."
dictionary.evolution:
My katana isn't just a sword.
It's blade severs all that
connects one to this world.
dictionary.fusion:
Your heart is tempered stronger than even steel.
I admire your spirit!
dictionary.summon:
Souls resting within my blade,
My last task will be to
fulfil your deepest wish!

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の閃光

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: 奥義・羅刹

dictionary.description: An other-worldly samurai that appeared in the ruined Bariura Empire. Demonic blade in hand, Mifune found the death he so desired as he fought aggressively against the gods. However, the demonic blade he carried wouldn't allow him to pass on so easily. Together with his demonic blade that had already claimed so many lives, upon death Mifune's skills sharpened even further, and it's said he was then able to chop down gods in a single blow.
dictionary.evolution:
Even if my soul should perish,
my demon sword's soul remains.
It's always calling me to battle.
dictionary.fusion:
Surely its beauty has faded.
But still, my blade continues to
demand more power.
dictionary.summon:
So fortune has you summoning me!
Do you know the spirit within my blade?
If so, then I shall devote it to you.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の閃光

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: 奥義・煌闇

dictionary.description: An otherworldly samurai who played an active role during the great war with the gods. Having already visited the underworld once, he was brought back to life by his demonic blade, gradually recovering his humanity as he clung to his fighting spirit. As he became one with his demonic blade, Mifune's renewed pride as a samurai filled him with power, surpassing ordinary humans with his abilities. It is said that even at the frontlines of the continuously losing Bariura, Mifune's surroundings had been stained red with the gods' blood.
dictionary.evolution:
My blade is my pride.
My spirit shall forever live on
the battlefield. This is my fate.
dictionary.fusion:
A blade is a mirror that reflects the heart.
Polishing one's heart
is to offer a victory prayer.
dictionary.summon:
My spirit never dies.
I just cut down my enemies.
I've become a battle demon.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ＆確率で防御貫通効果を付与
leader skill.name: 破壊神の重激

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性ダメージ
sbb.name: 極義・華厳

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 噛みつきシャドウ

dictionary.description: Glowy Slime's mutated form after being showered with magic. It has an extremely brutal nature and attacks humans it finds, all whilst constantly spitting out obscenities. However, since it is very weak like other slimes, it still is a good sparring partner for new Summoners. They've also been said to show kindness at times. Some think that it's actually just like Glowy Slime and that maybe it's just lonely.
dictionary.fusion:
Fusion? What the!?
*Growl* I don't wanna!
dictionary.summon:
*Growl* What're you lookin' at!?
Be your friend?
Of course I will! *Growl*

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性２連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 丸かじりシャドウ

dictionary.description: Just like Glowy Slime, when multiple Dark Slimes come together, they transform into Dark Slime King. Even though it's more brutal and obscene than Dark Slime, it still occasionally mixes in some kind words. Nonetheless, the destructive attacks it unleashes from its giant body are much stronger, and it is certainly more dangerous. It also has wings, but it has absolutely no ability to fly.
dictionary.evolution:
Would you mind if I evolved?
Huh? What's with that smile
on your face!? *Huff*
dictionary.fusion:
Wha-? Fusion!? *Huff*
No, no complaints from me! *Puff*
dictionary.summon:
Huh? Who are you? *Huff*
A Summoner? What's that!?
Fine, guess I'll follow you!

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 闇の護り

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性６連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 食べ尽くしシャドウ

dictionary.description: The Kaiser Gloomy is the evolved form of a King Gloomy which was exposed to pure evil energy while roaming Ishgria. Though it tends to spit out obscenities and profanity about everything around it, the Kaiser Gloomy's habit of saying something nice in the midst of it all remains a part of its personality. The bat-like things that surround it don't really serve much purpose, though they can be heard whispering vulgarities as they fly about. Some Kaiser Gloomy are known to rule over other Gloomy by establishing hierarchical colonies within caves.
dictionary.evolution:
I evolved! But what's with the face?
You got a problem, or something?
I can evolve if I want to, you know!
dictionary.fusion:
What the heck is this?
You're a stingy one, aren't you?
Oh well. Thanks, I guess.
dictionary.summon:
You must have a lot of guts
to have summoned me.
You'd make a good minion!

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ＆闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 闇神の天冠

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性４連ダメージ＆高確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: 鳳壁印

dictionary.description: A sorceress from the ruined Bariura Empire. Her sorcery was one of the various skills studied in Bariura. It was originally an art used to read fortunes using astronomy and calendars, but she set her own skills apart by emphasizing her magical abilities. History books say she was able to charm the natural forces, manipulating them and cause all sorts of phenomena.
dictionary.fusion:
So this is fusion, huh?
Guess I'm not as strong
as I thought...
dictionary.summon:
A Summoner?
I was called out by some kid...
Oh well, I'll help you.

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 闇の護り

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性６連ダメージ＆高確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: ソウルインテンション

dictionary.description: A sorceress from the ruined Bariura Empire. Her sorcery was one of the various skills studied in Bariura. It was originally an art used to read fortunes using astronomy and calendars, but she set her own skills apart by emphasizing her magical abilities. Her technique effectively combined cosmic forces with magic. As her path differed from those who aiming to remain as sorcerers, she came to be called a Magician instead.
dictionary.evolution:
Oh, seems I've changed.
Whatever, doesn't matter to me.
dictionary.fusion:
Fusion, huh... It's not so bad.
Just a bit troublesome is all.
dictionary.summon:
You're worried about me?
What a child...
But you sure are positive.

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 闇の護り

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性６連ダメージ＆高確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: グランドデスペリア

dictionary.description: A sorceress from the ruined Bariura Empire. Her powers of sorcery were evolved far beyond any other sorcerer or magician. However, as her power increased, those around her moved farther and farther away, but without pause she continued to devote herself to her research. Her behavior deteriorated as she gave up relationships for power, and soon even within the empire she was seen as an outsider.
dictionary.evolution:
Evolution, what now?
Didn't you have anything
better to do with your time?
dictionary.fusion:
Fusing to me means you
want to use me, correct?
A rare one, you are.
dictionary.summon:
What a troublesome
Summoner to call upon me.
Go ahead, just throw me away.

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 闇の護り

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性２連ダメージ＆高確率で病気状態にする
bb.name: ボーンスマッシュ

dictionary.description: An undead monster that moves freely thanks to the power of darkness in its bones. People tend to mistakenly think it still has a soul, but it is actually controlled by a dark force. It is unintelligent and doesn't sense pain, but it does have a very strong will to survive. It's said that it attacks those with a soul out to envy.
dictionary.fusion:
I-I will become stronger!
I will become stronger and
never have to die!!
dictionary.summon:
Ugh, I-I can't defeat you.
You are m-my master...

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性３連ダメージ＆高確率で病気状態にする
bb.name: ヴォーパルショック

dictionary.description: An undead monster that moves freely thanks to the power of darkness in its bones. It gains experience and wisdom through battle. Its combat ability is greatly enhanced due to having learned it can equip armor and a shield. It is more hostile towards the living, and more than group victories, it tends to strongly wish for its opponents' death.
dictionary.evolution:
I h-have evolved!!
I h-have evolved, m-master!!
dictionary.fusion:
M-Master!!
I want more power! Please!!
dictionary.summon:
H-Hurray!
Hurray for m-master!
I'm so happy! H-Hurray!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、カルマ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性６連ダメージ＆高確率で病気状態にする
bb.name: スカルヴァイン

dictionary.description: An undead monster born from bones infused with the power of darkness. Though normally they show little interest outside of the enemy in front of them, occassionally individuals appear that command larger groups in hopes of leading more to their deaths. Orders are in place that say should one of these especially harmful Skeletons be discovered it should be immediately destroyed. With their love for preying on villages, where the bones of the dead then become new Skeletons, ignoring their threat would only lead to their army growing stronger.
dictionary.evolution:
A-Awaiting command, M-Master!
G-Give me m-more tr-troops!
I'll destroy y-your enemies!
dictionary.fusion:
M-More! We n-need more!
More tr-troops! More!
dictionary.summon:
C-Command me t-to f-fight
for y-you s-sir!
Y-You are m-my Master!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、カルマ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性４連ダメージ＆高確率で毒状態にする
bb.name: ゴルゴンの瞳

dictionary.description: A demon with snakes instead of hair. Humans who look into her eyes are cursed and turned to stone. Not only are they highly poisonous, the snakes on her head have high vitality and will live for a while even if cut from her head. Many soldiers have lost their lives to these snakes, making Medusa a dangerous demon even after she's been defeated.
dictionary.fusion:
Careful now.
You'll turn to stone if you
fall in love with me...
dictionary.summon:
Don't look at my eyes,
they'll turn you to stone!
I look forward to our journey!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、カルマ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性５連ダメージ＆高確率で毒状態にする
bb.name: 黒蛇の心臓

dictionary.description: A demon with four brain-hungry snakes growing from her shoulders. It's said that Zahhak gains the knowledge of the person whose brains she eats, so she has a tendency to target intellectuals. They fear Zahhak more than other demons, and her name makes them shiver. Some Summoners receive great rewards from intellectuals for exterminating Zahhaks.
dictionary.evolution:
Let us continue our journey!
Oh, and my pets are
coming too!
dictionary.fusion:
These four are so happy.
They're slithering all over.
dictionary.summon:
Look at that delicious brain.
Alright, I'll be your friend!
Wait! My pets! Hold on!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、カルマ出現率をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の煌めき

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性８連ダメージ＆高確率で毒状態にする
bb.name: 魔蛇の魂魄

dictionary.description: A higher ranking demon nesting in desert ruins who is said to have devoured a large number of adventurers for sustenance. However, there was a period of time in which tales of encounters with this demon in the ruins came to an abrupt stop. Later, rumors surfaced that Lulujann had been invited by one of those adventurers to experience the outside world together. Thinking this completely absurd, scholars came to the conclusion that the demon was slain by an unknown hero within the ruins.
dictionary.evolution:
I haven't been in this form
in a while. Huh? What do I mean?
That's a secret...!
dictionary.fusion:
Humans are really strange. Are
you sure you want to give me power?
I might betray you some day.
dictionary.summon:
The color of your aura...
It resembles the one of that person...
I like you!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、カルマ出現率をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の煌めき

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力を少しアップ
bb.name: 悪魔のダンス

dictionary.description: A female demon of the night that mainly feeds on human souls. She likes the energy created the moment a healthy soul falls into darkness, and uses many methods to trap humans and obtain it. To the clergy it is a sin just to talk to her, and they have orders to resstrain her on sight. Despite this, Lilin continues in her pursuit.
dictionary.fusion:
Your feelings feel
very delicious.
dictionary.summon:
So you're that Summoner
everyone's talking about?
You're my type, wanna hang out?

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＨＣ出現率を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 心の輝き

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力を少しアップ
bb.name: 悪魔のキス

dictionary.description:
A female demon of the night that mainly feeds on human souls.
Demons of the night feed on human emotions, but Succubus only toys with humans for fun. She gains their trust through granting favors and then gets pleasure from breaking that trust. No matter how long one is with her, she can't be trusted. Many male Summoners give in to her lasciviousness, despite fearing the eventual betrayal.
dictionary.evolution:
Mmm... I just can't stand it
when you do that!
dictionary.fusion:
Look into my eyes.
Don't you love me?
dictionary.summon:
Oh, how cute!
It looks like I won't get
enough sleep now because of you.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＨＣ出現率を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 心の輝き

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をアップ
bb.name: 悪魔の×××

dictionary.description: A high class demon of the night sometimes called the "Princess of the Night." She usually draws in members of other species with her pheromones before making them her slaves. Unlike the Succubus she isn't known for her betrayals, but once she decides on a partner she sticks with them until she's absorbed all their vitality. When absorbing partners with higher concentrations of vitality it is said that she then tries herself to strengthen others, though by doing so it's said that she possesses their bodies eternally.
dictionary.evolution:
You're so wonderful!
What are you planning to do
with me now that I'm like this?
dictionary.fusion:
That was nice, but I sure
would like some more.
You know what to do, right?
dictionary.summon:
Kneel before me.
From today forward
you are my toy!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＨＣ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 心の煌めき

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性３連ダメージ
bb.name: ブラッドグラトニー

dictionary.description: A demon that lives in the night. Sunlight is its weakness. It is only active when the sun is down. It's immortal and can only be killed through external causes. As it drinks human blood to live, it is their natural enemy. Young female blood is its favorite. It stalks women it likes, waiting for its chance to strike. Male blood works too, but it attacks them much more violently.
dictionary.fusion:
Hmm, that's not too bad,
but I like the blood of
young women better.
dictionary.summon:
Did you wake me?
I don't wake well, so be
to protect yourself.

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 闇の護り

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: アビスゲート

dictionary.description: A being with more magical power than all the other demons of the night. It overcame death through diligent magic study, and became a creature that can be resurrected any time it dies. According to a priest who had tried to defeat it, "It is not resurrected, but lives while at the same time being dead." Due to this, he was unable to win and lost his life at the hands of the Lich.
dictionary.evolution:
You continue to seek darkness?
Fine, then feel free to sink
into the dark abyss.
dictionary.fusion:
Hehe, how wonderful.
You'd do well to offer
up more of this power.
dictionary.summon:
How dare you not bow your
head to the Undead King?
You'll regret this...

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 闇の護り

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性７連ダメージ
bb.name: ディメントホール

dictionary.description: The immortal king of magical beings whose magical powers are beyond those of even Lich. However, to humans this Legion is little more than a shell created according to the legend of the undying Lich, and Legion's true body is said to exist somewhere else. There also exists a forbidden book which foretells that should his true body and soul be reunited, the power born from that would surpass even the gods and the ensuing massacre would be enough to fill the entire world with bodies.
dictionary.evolution:
Are you pleased by the
sight of my temporal form?
Ha ha, how foolish of you, human.
dictionary.fusion:
Why should a demon lord
grant his power for your sake?
Summoners are so arrogant.
dictionary.summon:
Summoner of the demon lord,
what is it that you desire of me?
To rule the world? Or to destroy it?

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 闇の結界

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１２連ダメージ＆確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
bb.name: ディスペアーホール

dictionary.description: An apparition which continued using the forbidden demon techniques that had brought despair to the world, attaining powers very similar to those of the gods'. Transcending death he made his ascent as king of the demons, turning himself against the world. Zaboeth led the demon race into numerous shrine raids, helping to diminish the gods' power for some time. However, most humans are unaware of this wicked demon's effect on the world. This unfamiliar part of history that humans have left in the shadows tells of the grand battles between the gods and the demons.
dictionary.evolution:
You dare awaken me?
Heh heh, foolish being.
I shall reward you with horror.
dictionary.fusion:
So you haven't noticed yet?
Heh heh heh...
Ignorance truly is bliss.
dictionary.summon:
If you are unaware, I shall tell you.
You have chosen a future
full of destruction. Mwa ha ha.

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減＆全てのユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇創神の結界

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に闇属性を付与＆２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
sbb.name: エタニティサースト

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: カタストロフィ

dictionary.description: A supervisor of all magicians in the ruined Bariura Empire. Deeply trusted by the emperor, he oversaw many experiments throughout the empire. He zealously researched a variety of sorcery, focusing on black magic. He called himself a dark magician. Rumor was he discovered new techniques through human experiments, but he would just smile and neither confirm nor deny this.
dictionary.fusion:
Mwahaha. Here we go.
I'm on the verge of
something amazing!
dictionary.summon:
Let us make a pact.
From now on, you'll be my
new subject... Mwahaha!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 猛者の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: ダークマター

dictionary.description: A supervisor of all magicians in the ruined Bariura Empire. He continued his research and gained the  power to manipulate most living things. As his interest turned from the living to the dead, he came to befeared, making himself known as a necromancer. Although unproven, it's said he discovered an even more powerful magic before the war and this may even have been what triggered the gods' anger.
dictionary.evolution:
Seems my research is
moving forward...
Just a little bit more...
dictionary.fusion:
Will you be my subject, Summoner?
Interesting. Let's get to
work immediately!
dictionary.summon:
......
Summoner, you're not enough.
Bring me more subjects!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 王者の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性９連ダメージ
bb.name: サクリファイス

dictionary.description: A supervisor of all magicians in the ruined Bariura Empire. As his empire faced collapse from the gods' attack, he decided to present the findings of his research. He was now able to sublimate living beings, and though their bodies were destroyed in the process, as his servants their spirits were ferociously powerful. It's rumored that his research produced more additional findings, though none are recorded in any known documents.
dictionary.evolution:
Would you like to see the
findings of my research?
I warn you, they're frightening...
dictionary.fusion:
The dead are my guinea pigs.
My research can continue.
Mwa ha ha ha...
dictionary.summon:
A Summoner, I see.
That's fine with me.
I can use you in my research.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性２５連ダメージ
bb.name: ソウルプリズン

dictionary.description: A sorcerer from the Bariura Empire who could command all magical spells. During the end of the great war with the gods, he disappeared along with his extensive research facility. Records left behind state that afterwards, when the Imperial Army had been surrounded by the God Army, a being that resembled Shida appeared on the battlefield and destroyed all the enemies present in an instant. However, testimony from a knight who witnessed it all says that Shida murmured "I have found the materials I need for my new research. I shall be on my way." and then disappeared into the darkness.
dictionary.evolution:
This form is the result
of my research.
You wouldn't understand.
dictionary.fusion:
It still has an effect on me
in this form. Heh heh heh.
I never get tired of Fusion...
dictionary.summon:
Since I had nothing to study, I left.
Did I need any other reason?
We could've shared the results.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ＆光属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 光神の威光

sbb.desc: 味方のＢＢゲージを超絶増加＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に全属性を付与
sbb.name: グランドカオス

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性４連ダメージ＆高確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: クライムペイン

dictionary.description: A devil said to be the enemy of all life. Originally from Hades, they appear in this world as commanded by Hell King Hades. As the balance keeper between this world and hell, their orders are to destroy those who disturb the balance. A swing of their scythe can only kill those who are already meant to die. No words of kindness or pity affect Memetes.
dictionary.fusion:
Why would you strenghten me,
enemy of all living things?
You are an unusual human.
dictionary.summon:
I control death.
I will help you as long
as your path is true.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性５連ダメージ＆高確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: カオスフォール

dictionary.description: The king of all devils who live in hell. Usually he would send his subordinates when something in the living world concerned him and would rarely appear himself. His appearance in the world meant that the situation was beyond Memetes' capabilities. When Hades harvests a soul, it is severed from all regret and attachment to the world, depriving it of all spiritual resistance.
dictionary.evolution:
The gates to hell are open.
I grant eternal peace to
all living things.
dictionary.fusion:
When you visit hell,
I can assure you a peaceful rest.
dictionary.summon:
I am the King of Hell.
Let me be your guide as to
what defines life and death.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の煌めき

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性６連ダメージ＆高確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: 闇の異界

dictionary.description: The god that rules over death. Lodaga does not grant death, rather he is death itself. Only seen by those on the brink of death, those who do see him know to prepare themselves for what's coming next. Meanwhile, some think he is gracious and that he appears before his targets in order to give them time to put their affairs in order. Those who believe this are thought to be odd, though.
dictionary.evolution:
I will stay with you until you
fall into eternal rest.
dictionary.fusion:
The only difference between
the living and the dead is whether
they reside here or in hell.
dictionary.summon:
Death makes all men equal.
Are you one to dispute this?
Or perhaps you're different?

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の閃光

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性８連ダメージ＆高確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: 冥界の扉

dictionary.description: The Death God Lodaga and the Soul Keeper Lemia fought for a long time. Then one day before Lemia's very eyes Lodaga transformed. Taking attack after wicked attack from this sinister form, she felt somehow nostalgic. Realizing why she felt this way, she was filled with fear. Dilias had searched her out in order to consume her and complete his evolution.
dictionary.evolution:
Bwa ha ha...ha ha ha!
Why!? Why is my heart filled
with such emptiness?
dictionary.fusion:
Power...more power!
Dedicate your soul to me
and fill this void within me!
dictionary.summon:
I am Dilias, ruler of the dead.
I am filled with a great emptiness
which I don't know how to fill.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを７５％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の神光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１０連ダメージ＆高確率で呪い状態にする
sbb.name: ソウルイーター

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: シャドウインサルト

dictionary.description: The scythe-wielding, eighth princess of the ruined Bariura Empire. Despite being a princess, she was trained in combat since youth due to her magical talent. The harsh training took from her the concept of freedom, leaving military success as her only goal in life. Her scythe was infused with her magic, and she smiled ominously as she cleaved her enemies.
dictionary.fusion:
I must get even stronger.
That is my father's wish.
dictionary.summon:
Where are we?
Must I still fight?
Guess it can't be helped.

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性７連ダメージ
bb.name: クリムゾンリーパー

dictionary.description: The scythe-wielding, eighth princess of the ruined Bariura Empire. She was gradually consumed by madness as she fought with her weapon. She continued killing, but eventually guilt began to pool up inside her. The emperor noticed this and led her deeper into the darkness in hopes of making her into a weapon for the empire.
dictionary.evolution:
How am I like this?
OK then, you don't have to
say anything...
dictionary.fusion:
Ugh... I-I'm fine.
All that energy just
got to me a bit...
dictionary.summon:
What more do you wish of me?
I can't take it anymore.
But what else can I do...

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: アバドンイーター

dictionary.description: The insane, scythe-wielding, eighth princess of the ruined Bariura Empire. During the war she was rebuked for letting her own squad perish in order to annihilate an army of the gods. However, after this happened she calmly headed back to the front lines saying, "They were in my way." From then on, none could stop her from fighting. Legend says she cut down god after god, smiling until the day she died.
dictionary.evolution:
It's OK. I'm not broken.
I perform best in this
rough state.
dictionary.fusion:
Grant me more souls...
I still desire more...
dictionary.summon:
You're terrible.
We can't hold off any longer.
Let us destroy the world!

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性９連ダメージ
bb.name: アポリオンクライム

dictionary.description: Alice once lost her life in the battle with the gods. However, there are various widespread reports of her being sighted afterwards. What's more is that she was said to have been after the lives of humans, not gods. The truth is unknown but there are two strong theories. One is that her spirit was being controlled by the gods. Another explains that, though she was ressurrected when her empire was rebuilt, her mind was still broken. Either case being true, there's no doubt her power was far greater than it'd ever been before.
dictionary.evolution:
I am no one.
There is no meaning to me.
That's why I will destroy all.
dictionary.fusion:
Ngh... Agh...
Hehe, don't worry about it.
I don't mind this pain at all.
dictionary.summon:
You must despise a lot too
having summoned me.
Shall I ease your suffering?

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 闇獄神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復
sbb.name: ブラッドリーザー

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１３連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする＆味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: アポリオンデリュージ

dictionary.description: Having lost her life in battle, Alice continued to dye her sickle with the blood of her enemies while unconscious. This was due to the fact that she had collected a countless amount of souls while cursing the world during her lifetime. However, Alice suddenly recovered her consciousness when amongst the numerous souls in her body, a light spoke softly to her. She had no recollection of what the light was, but she got a familiar feeling from it nevertheless. As tears streamed down her face, she muttered the word "sister" to herself, and began to fight for her survival with both darkness and light within her.
dictionary.evolution:
This may be my last chance.
But...that's why I want to fight.
And this time, of my own free will!
dictionary.fusion:
Argh.. It's okay...
It hurts, but I'm fine...
I know you have good intentions...
dictionary.summon:
I had someone taking care of me...
No, I already knew that.
I'm sure someone cares for you too...

extra skill.desc: ＨＰを少し吸収＆通常攻撃時、ＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
extra skill.name: 胸に差す光

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を１００％アップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 闇煉界神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、回復力に応じて攻撃力を大幅にアップ・ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ
sbb.name: スペル・ディプライヴ

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な闇属性２３連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰを大回復＆３ターン、回復力を超絶アップ・ターン毎にＨＰを大回復
ubb.name: ミッシング

dictionary.description:
A small fairy thought to be born from dark, one of the six elements made by the gods.
It's an annoying, angry creature that preaches constantly. It's not very intelligent, so its wide-ranging sermons are superficial. It adds "pune" as a suffix when it thinks something is good. Summoners look for it to have the ability to grant special powers to other beings.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Dark Nymph-pune!
You are really interesting.
That's it! I will go with you-pune.

dictionary.description: A spirit that rules dark, one of the six elements created by the gods. It speaks politely, but it's hard to know what it's thinking as its speech lacks feeling. It speaks as if it is obedient, but may act completely opposite. It's hard to handle, but as legend speaks of their power to unlock the potential of others, they are often sought out by Summoners.
dictionary.summon:
Thank you, Summoner.
For good or for evil,
use my power as you please.

dictionary.description: Worshipers of the dark gave this miraculous stone idol life through prayer. Known as the devil idol, it is said to be cursed, and anyone who sees it as well as those around them will face misfortune. The statue's power of prayer turns into a powerful curse with time, but after overcoming that it's said that it can awaken a great power hidden from within others.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Dark Idol.
You seem to know my purpose.
I will go with you.

dictionary.description: A form created by the gods that embodies the strength of dark. It's huge, has powerful magic, and is very hard to control, so much so that even the gods who tried were forced to seal it away again. Its appearance engulfs the world in darkness, at which time the creatures of the dark begin to invade. Legend tells of those who bathe in its magic hoping to gain the power to fight the gods.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Dark Totem.
You would be wise to use my
godly powers responsibly.

dictionary.description: A rare being said to be magical and to have recorded the time when the gods created the world. Along with the other metal type monsters, they are called the metal record species. Those who obtain one are awarded with loads of experience, so summoners often hunt them. So in addition to being rare, competition for them is fierce, making them even more difficult to capture.
dictionary.summon:
Huh? I was captured?
And I'm usually so good at
escaping... Oh well, be gentle.

dictionary.description: A rare being said to be magical and to have recorded the time when the gods created the world. It's of the metal record species. It's assumed to have much more experience than a Metal Ghost due to its bigger body. They don't belong to any one gender, but as their personality is more masculine, their speech usually earns them cold stares from women.
dictionary.evolution:
Whoa, see how evolved I am?
Now I can get all the ladies?
That's gonna be a problem...
dictionary.summon:
Are you a Summoner?
Oh, well... Can you fuse
me with a cute girl!?

dictionary.description: The largest and rarest among the metal record species, which is said to have recorded the time when the gods created the world. They are much larger than Metal Kings. It's speculated that tremendous volumes of records are hidden in their bodies. They are so rare that Summoners who travel to Grand Gaia and see one are said to have used up all of their luck.
dictionary.summon:
Hohoho!
You'll always keep me by
your side, right? Right!?

dictionary.description: A monster that mimics a treasure chest. It is extremely powerful, and is always looking for something to put in its belly. It's not fussy about its prey, and the summoners who suffer the most are those who let their guards down. It naturally uses mimicry to lure in the unprepared, but some aggressive Mimics will even try to get attention by calling people.
dictionary.summon:
Feed me... growl rowl!
Work, magic, bright, gold, element.
Feed me something... growl grrr!

dictionary.description: A monster that mimics a treasure chest. It's unknown how it folds and hides its wings while mimicking. It's said a Mimic will evolve into a Winged Mimic after eating a great number of things, organic or otherwise. This may result in it granting a much more powerful effect than a normal Mimic when used as fusion material.
dictionary.summon:
Delicious! Stinky! Ouch!
Meat, organs, blood, bones...
Get in my belly!

dictionary.description: A monster that mimics a treasure chest. Its name comes from how its insides resemble a dragon. Even among mimics it's extremely rare, and most reports of discovery are unconfirmed. However, even if one were to find one, it's much more powerful than other mimics, so Summoners who run into a Dragon Mimic must prepare for a life-or-death battle.
dictionary.summon:
Blood will flow!
Burn, drown, crush, blind...
I won't forget how you taste!

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性４連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: 忍法・刃落の術

dictionary.description: A ninja said to have lived in the ruined Bariura Empire. There was an incident where this man in a strange outfit suddenly appeared in the empire. A rumor spread that this strange person, known as a shinobi, had come from another world. However, afterwards, almost no one saw him again. Later, scholars surmised that this was because of his pride and dislike for standing out.
dictionary.fusion:
...
So you will give power to me,
one who lives in the dark?
dictionary.summon:
Are you my new master?
I have nothing more to say.
Just give me my mission.

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の光

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性５連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: アサシンダガー

dictionary.description: A ninja said to have lived in the ruined Bariura Empire. After the rumors of Oboro died down, a member of the imperial family was assassinated after advocating peace and a reduction in war expenditures. Rumors spread that the perpetrator was dressed in black, yet somehow Oboro's name never came up. It was almost as if someone had tried to erase any evidence that he had any involvement in the incident.
dictionary.evolution:
Are you trying to lead me
further into darkness?
Alright, I'll be your blade.
dictionary.fusion:
......
You who gives me power...
Whose life are you after?
dictionary.summon:
A shinobi's place is in the dark.
I don't speak,
I just accomplish my missions!

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の光

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性６連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: 秘儀・異域之鬼

dictionary.description: A ninja said to have lived in the ruined Bariura Empire. After the string of assassinations in the empire ended, a girl saw a strangely clothed person around dawn, though it was still mostly dark and it was never proved to be Oboro. Even today there is debate over his time in Grand Gaia, such as what his intentions were and under whose orders he was acting under.
dictionary.evolution:
Summoner!
What would you have me do,
the blade in the dark?
dictionary.fusion:
......
I will train my blade
for you!
dictionary.summon:
Live in the shadows,
die in the shadows.
That is the shinobi way.

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の威光

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性７連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: 禁・魔煉甲

dictionary.description: A ninja from the Bariura Empire thought to have used secret techniques. There are differing opinions on who his master was because he fought alongside two unique allies, Magress and Shida. One after the emperor's life, while the other was dedicated to protecting it. Fighting alongside both as they fought each other led to much speculation concerning Oboro's master. Both having failed in their assassination attempts, the gods would soon see that the truth was lost forever.
dictionary.evolution:
I'll take the life of anyone
my master commands me to.
Not even gods can escape me.
dictionary.fusion:
I vow to clean up any
obstacle that appears in
my master's way.
dictionary.summon:
Watch my secret techniques.
I'll reveal all of my secret
ninja arts to my master!

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の威光

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１２連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: 呪禁・闇獄鬼葬

dictionary.description: A ninja said to have lived in the ruined Bariura Empire. Nobody knows where his loyalties laid in ancient times, but literary works state that this ninja from the underworld swore fealty to the emperor. The account mentions that the emperor got Oboro to work for him by offering him esoteric texts with secret underworld techniques written within as a reward for his services. After Oboro finally got his hands on these hidden techniques, he parted from the emperor in search of an appropriate resting place. It is believed that there was once a continuation to this story, but unfortunately this has yet to be confirmed.
dictionary.evolution:
My wish has been fulfilled. I've
gained my lost clan's techniques.
I've been reborn!
dictionary.fusion:
......
I will be your shadow.
I pledge myself to you till the end.
dictionary.summon:
Ninjas must remain in the shadows.
Leaving our names behind is shameful.
A true ninja will...

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の覇光

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な闇属性１８連ダメージ＆高確率で毒・呪い状態にする＆確率で攻撃力を１ターン超絶低下
sbb.name: 天兇封魔影斬

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性５連ダメージ＆確率で毒状態にする
bb.name: グラビディサーヴァント

dictionary.description: A sorceress specializing in necromancy. Originally considered to have a bright future as State Sorceress of the Bariura Empire, a failed magic experiment ended up taking the life of her lover. In a desperate bid to revive him, Lemia turned her attention to the outlawed practice of necromancy, a move which swiftly ostracized her from her sorcerer peers. However, far from deterred, she secretly continued her necromancy studies.
dictionary.fusion:
I thank you.
You have helped me move
forward in my quest...
dictionary.summon:
I have my own hopes and dreams.
Will you be the one to turn
them into reality?

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、カルマ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の輝き

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性６連ダメージ＆確率で毒状態にする
bb.name: グラシャ＝ラボラス

dictionary.description: A sorceress specializing in necromancy. Despite Lemia’s best efforts to revive her dead lover, nothing she tried seemed to work. Undeterred, she continued in her research, eventually spawning countless zombies who spread an evil miasma across the land. As her creations wandered the earth searching for blood, soon the very mention of her name struck fear into the hearts of people everywhere.
dictionary.evolution:
A life of perpetual sin is the
punishment I've been handed.
I have nothing to fear anymore.
dictionary.fusion:
I don’t want your kindness.
Kindness merely serves to
increase the pain I feel.
dictionary.summon:
So long as you can fulfill my wish,
I don’t care what happens to me.
Please, I beg you... End my pain.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、カルマ出現率をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の煌めき

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性８連ダメージ＆確率で毒状態にする
bb.name: ブラックホール

dictionary.description: A sorceress specializing in necromancy. Lemia’s activities incurred the wrath of Death God Lodaga, who criticized her for meddling in the affairs of his world. When Lemia refused to stop, a power struggle ensued between her and Lodaga for the right to control the souls of the dead. The struggle ended up lasting until Lemia, herself, was no more, though it’s said that the tormented voices of souls she once commanded can still be heard to this day.
dictionary.evolution:
The power to control the dead...
It is yours if you so desire...
I have no need of it anymore...
dictionary.fusion:
Hehe...
Yes... Yes, that’s it...
Now, I can be me...
dictionary.summon:
You need of me, even though
I've already succumbed to darkness?
So be it. I offer you my all...

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、カルマ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の閃光

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１０連ダメージ＆確率で毒状態にする
bb.name: アスモデウス

dictionary.description: A sorceress specializing in necromancy. Her hopes of reviving her dead lover were dashed by Dilias. He had consumed the soul of the man she so longed to see. After learning the truth she went mad, cursing the entire world. She dedicated all her magic to seeing that all spirits were returned to a world of nothingness, as she wished to see what would be left after gods, men, the living, and the dead were all destroyed.
dictionary.evolution:
There is no peace here.
That is why I must destroy all.
All can rest in peace then.
dictionary.fusion:
I will soon break at this rate.
I can't forgive anything anymore.
Not even myself...
dictionary.summon:
Why do you appear before me?
I've nothing but despair now.
Do you still desire to battle?

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率を少しアップ・カルマ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の灯火

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１２連ダメージ＆確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
sbb.name: 闇の世界

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性６連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: 夜光蟲

dictionary.description: A dancing girl who came from another world. It's said that when she dances, she is surrounded by a red mist. Those curious enough to watch her dance sometimes end up paying with their lives. It's said that she gave up on the place where she was born and raised before coming to Grand Gaia. It is recorded that when one person asked why, she laughed and said, "There's no one left to destroy over there," upon which the inquirer was lost in a sea of blood.
dictionary.fusion:
I like blood.
I want to see more.
I want more blood...
dictionary.summon:
Hehe, so you summoned me?
How nice, looks like I can
make it rain blood again...

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性８連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: 千年夜光蟲

dictionary.description: A dancing girl who came from another world. It was probably only natural that Kikuri, the girl who relished in the sight of her enemies' blood, would find herself on the battlefield. Her wicked blade, which stained red both enemy and ally alike, would eventually be stopped by Mifune who was from the same world as her. To this she responded, quizzically tilting her head to the side, "Why am only I in trouble? We're all demons, are we not?"
dictionary.evolution:
You're a great human.
So great, in fact, I want
to soak you in blood.
dictionary.fusion:
If you're going to fuse them
to me, can I see their blood?
It'd be a waste otherwise...
dictionary.summon:
Together, you and I will
stain the world red with blood.
Hehe, I'm looking forward to it!

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１０連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: 神閃夜光蟲

dictionary.description: A dancing girl who came from another world. Her actions changed greatly when the war with the gods began. Having fought only to see bloodshed up until then, she turned her sights on the gods. What changed her mind remains a mystery, but what is certain is that her blades became even sharper upon taking on the gods. It's said her many massive blades swiftly soaked the gods red.
dictionary.evolution:
I'm up for anything fun.
Hey, why don't we play in
a shower of blood?
dictionary.fusion:
Bathing in blood makes me stong.
You know this, right?
Even your blood, you know?
dictionary.summon:
The most beautiful worlds
are the ones that are red...
Why don't we make this one so?

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１３連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: 夜蓮桜蛾蟲

dictionary.description: A dancing girl who came from another world. During the tumultuous battle with the gods, blood flowed throughout her battlefield. As the elegance and strength of her dancing increased, more and more humans lost their lives, and the battlefield soon became sparse. Continuously spouting her discontent, she came across someone on the battlefield. Though she would come to fight alongside this person, it is said she saw her not as an ally, but as her potential prey.
dictionary.evolution:
I'm pretty in red, don't you think?
Hehe, I could be even prettier
if you gave me more blood, though.
dictionary.fusion:
I just love how rich and
prosperous you seem.
Share your wealth with me?
dictionary.summon:
I will reduce all of your
enemies to a bloodbath.
That's what you want, right?

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
leader skill.name: 闇紅神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１５連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする＆自分のクリティカル率をアップ
sbb.name: 闇葬の雨

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１８連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で呪いを発生する効果を付与
bb.name: 久怨殲洸蟲

dictionary.description: A dancing girl who came from another world. Having joined forces with Sefia to confront the gods during the last stages of the great war, Kikuri was absorbed into another world amidst all the fighting. No one ever saw her again after that, but it is said that she met her great rival in battle within the vortex she had fallen into. However, no records exist of that battle either, though there is a rumor that lingers till this day which claims that Kikuri's last words were "It was so much fun fighting you."
dictionary.evolution:
These are my burial clothes.
Scarlet is beautiful, right? Can
I add some of your color to it too?
dictionary.fusion:
The fate of a flower is to wither.
Once you've helped me bloom,
won't you wither away for me too?
dictionary.summon:
It was all so fun back then. He he.
The memories are so painful.
I wish the pain would cut deeper.

extra skill.desc: 「宝髪飾『緋血神刺』」を装備時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
extra skill.name: 血禍奔流

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を１００％アップ＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 闇紅華神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性２２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で呪いを発生する効果を付与・被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
sbb.name: 屍昏葬の雨

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な闇属性２５連ダメージ＆３ターン、ターン終了時に追加ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力を超絶アップ
ubb.name: 終の仇華

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、防御力を少しアップ
bb.name: 悪魔の障壁

dictionary.description: Vulgar monsters that prefer living in ruins. Their abilities as demons are weak, but they have a warlike disposition. The 3 prong spear they have is given to them when their born and it grows as they do. It is often critiqued that they are mischievous, though there are many humans who have been caught in fiendish traps who've been quoted as saying, "This goes a bit beyond what one might consider mischievous."
dictionary.fusion:
Ha ha ha!!
How wonderful!
I love it when this happens!
dictionary.summon:
Hya ha ha ha!!
Let's do something fun!
I know! Let me skewer you!

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、防御力をアップ
bb.name: 闇の障壁

dictionary.description: Monsters that prefer living in ruins. Once an Imp grows up it becomes an Incubus. They have the reputation of having mean and vulgar personalities, and since they relentlessly pester human women they are considered their natural enemy. However, women aren't the only ones that an Incubus bothers. They also direct their mean acts towards demons like themselves, which has made them hated even among their own species.
dictionary.evolution:
Oh, so that's how it is!
Alright then, let me show you
one way grown-ups have fun!
dictionary.fusion:
The ladies won't be able to
resist this new power of mine!
Ah ha ha!
dictionary.summon:
You have some cute
girls with you, right?
I'll help you with them!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、カルマ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の輝き

bb.desc: ランダムで敵単体に闇属性４連ダメージ
bb.name: ラストポーカー

dictionary.description: A gambler who made a name for himself in the La Veda Republic. Picked up by some older gamblers as a child, he spent his life in casinos. He was a steady better but in certain key moments he was also able to produce big wins. It's believed he used trickery skills passed down from his elders despite no one having proof of this, and it's also been said he was such a strong fighter that anyone who dared challenge him would up half dead. If Zeul were to ever have to rely on luck it would mean he'd already lost.
dictionary.fusion:
Alright, I'll call.
Your skillful way of playing is
better than I could ever do.
dictionary.summon:
Nice, here's my chance.
I'll go along with you.
That's all there is to do.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ゼル出現率をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 富の輝き

bb.desc: ランダムで敵単体に闇属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: ジョーカーデス

dictionary.description: A gambler who made a name for himself in the La Veda Republic. With trickery as his main weapon Zeul continued his winning streak, though after a big win he would often disappear for a while only to return broke. There's a rumor he would take large amounts of money to otherworld casinos where he enjoyed playing with demons and making insane bets, though this has not been confirmed. Himself stating that his reason for living was to put his life on the line, even his colleagues avoided getting involved with him, saying he was just asking for trouble.
dictionary.evolution:
This is the showdown
I've been waiting for.
I'd bet my life on it.
dictionary.fusion:
Alright, let's raise.
I really like the chance
you just took.
dictionary.summon:
No choice but to go all-in.
I'm placing my bet on you.
This is how it should go.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ゼル出現率をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 富の輝き

dictionary.description: A curious creature that lives in a pot which is said to hold a power capable of dramatically changing the properties of dark. Completely aware that Summoners are after the pot it's in and not the creature itself, once captured they develop a totally negative attitude. Regardless of what kind words one uses in addressing them, they always respond with "Either way, you know it's not ME you really want..." leading many to give up consoling them altogether.
dictionary.summon:
It's not me you need
but my pot, right?
I'm unwanted, aren't I?

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性６連ダメージ＆３ターン、自分の防御力の半分を転換して攻撃力をアップ
bb.name: ブラックハザード

dictionary.description: A soldier from the plebeian Bariura Empire. Since he was sent to the front lines to fight as a soldier, he was successful in many exploits and promoted to knighthood. After that he continued with his service, earning him numerous medals and the rank of army commander. Though the way he climbed up the military ranks without undertaking much damage was outstanding, he was really bad at social activities, and was thus shunned by other knights. Though he was usually very gentle and ordinary, in the battlefield he became a merciless demon, making him a presence feared by both friend and foe.
dictionary.fusion:
As my thanks to you, I will train you.
I will teach you the rules and physical abilities you'll need to survive on the field.
dictionary.summon:
I am Bahvel, a knight of Bariura.
I may still be inexperienced as a knight, but I'll carry out every one of your commands.
That's a promise.

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの防御力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇神の加護

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性８連ダメージ＆３ターン、自分の防御力の半分を転換して攻撃力をアップ
bb.name: ブラックベーゼ

dictionary.description: A soldier from the plebeian Bariura Empire. For some reason he got along well with one of the Six Heroes, Magress, and the pair were called "the friends without many friends." However, Bahvel was wrongly accused of having entrapped Magress's father, when in reality it had been someone else who had done it out of jealousy towards him. Whilst in battle, Bahvel suffered a great wound on his face , which dispelled any doubts he had had about fighting the furious Magress. Afterwards he came to hide his wound with a helmet, and continued to lend Magress his power behind the scenes.
dictionary.evolution:
You're curious about the helmet, right?
I only wear it to hide my scar,
otherwise it makes that guy anxious.
dictionary.fusion:
I don't know if I'm still inexperienced as a knight,
but I've lead a life thus far that I've never been ashamed of.
dictionary.summon:
Do you understand my beliefs?
If you can grasp that, then I can answer to you with my full power.

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの防御力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇創神の加護

dictionary.description: A member of the metal record species that mimics a treasure chest. It's said that it's made up of metal record monsters who hid from their enemies and fused inside the chest before evolving and deciding to take revenge instead, though the truth is unknown. Though it looks like a Bat Mimic, it boasts the defense of a member of the metal record species. As hard as they are to encounter, they're even harder to deal with once one comes across one.
dictionary.evolution:
Hmm...
What happened to me!?
Did I evolve!?
dictionary.summon:
Whoa there!
Ah, umm...no wait!
Yeah, let's have some fun!

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: カオスレイジ

dictionary.description: Disciple of Cardes the Malevolent. Since his leader Cardes was sealed away he cannot use his full power, but even so he's powerful enough that normal Summoners stand no chance against him. Very skilled at stealth attacks and assassinations, there are few gods who can even sense Zebra's presence when he conceals himself. Anyone unfortunate enough to see his dual blade sword is cut to pieces before they even know what hit them.
dictionary.fusion:
What human ritual is this!?
How disrespectful of you to
offer power to a god.
dictionary.summon:
I'll lend you my power,
as weak as you are, Summoner.
Just know, I will likely turn on you.

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の刃

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１２連ダメージ
bb.name: ソウルインベイジョン

dictionary.description: Zebra, disciple of Cardes the Malevolent, in his true form. An incredibly ominous creature whose heartless attacks struck fear in the hearts of those it fought during the great war in which the gods destroyed the humans. He's often mistaken for a death god because of how he harvests the souls of his victims with his right hand after slaying them with the sword in his left, but he very much hates this, sending any who dare address him so to a tragic end.
dictionary.evolution:
I'm back to my true form.
But you better be prepared.
I can erase you at any time.
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel the energy
filling me from the inside.
I feel my true power returning...
dictionary.summon:
How curious that you should
summon me in my true form.
I shall accompany you for a while.

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージを大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の覇刃

bb.desc: 敵全体に水・樹・闇属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: ユーサネイジア

dictionary.description: The second youngest of the Six Sibyl Sisters who fought against the gods in order to save the humans. It's thought that she agreed to help save the humans out of her love for her sister Sola. However Madia was an idealist, demanding that whatever her beloved sister Sola was fighting for had better be worth it. Time and time again, she witnessed the humans commit countless atrocities. As a result, she ended up resenting her sisters for helping such wicked creatures.
dictionary.fusion:
I will receive your power.
However, this does nothing to
lessen my hatred for mankind.
dictionary.summon:
You wish for me to fight
again, don’t you Summoner?
You humans are so cruel.

leader skill.desc: 水・樹・闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 紫闇の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水・樹・闇属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: インスティンクション

dictionary.description: The second youngest of the Six Sibyl Sisters. Though she fought alongside her sisters to save the humans at the beginning of the war, having seen what they were capable of she parted ways from her beloved sister Sola. Though her sisters Sola, Freya, and Zele tried to stop them, she teamed up with Eliza and Paula, the three of them laying waste to humans as the Fresh Blood Sisters. Though it's said her wings were stained red with their blood, there are no documents which speak of the evil acts she supposedly witnessed.
dictionary.evolution:
I've simply borrowed the dark
power you humans possess.
How do I look to you now?
dictionary.fusion:
Please make sure my
elder sister knows that I
haven't forgiven you yet.
dictionary.summon:
How does it feel, human,
being so wicked yet still receiving
my elder sister's protection?

leader skill.desc: 水・樹・闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 紫闇神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水・樹・闇属性１５連ダメージ
bb.name: フィアペネトレイション

dictionary.description: The second youngest of the Six Sibyl Sisters. The darkness that consumed the human race came pouring into innocent Madia, growing to an uncontrollable level, and forcing her to attack her beloved elder sister, Sola. Madia was aware that Sola was attempting to help her, but her thoughts ended up contradicting those of her elder sister. She came to believe that by exterminating all humans, the cause of all this calamity, she would be able to recover the relationship she had once shared with her sisters. And thus, with Sola as the main obstacle keeping her from achieving her goal, she surrendered herself to the darkness once more in order to eliminate her.
dictionary.evolution:
I no longer have control
over my own self.
It's like...I'm somebody different...
dictionary.fusion:
More power is entering my body...
But...I don't want any more...
dictionary.summon:
My sister keeps intruding...
So I can't be with her anymore...
If she would just go away...

leader skill.desc: 水・樹・闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 紫闇創神の力

60245.name: 冥紫の闇女神マディア

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水・樹・闇属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加・攻撃に水・樹・闇属性を付与
sbb.name: ホロウ・イクリール

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ・攻撃に闇属性を付与
bb.name: 破壊モード

dictionary.description: A strange mechanical figure from another world. It is not known when or even where it was made. It did, however, seem to have a purpose. Duel-GX was created to defeat that which destroyed the world in which it was created. To accomplish this it began looking for others to help as it started to strengthen itself as well. The first person it identified as its partner was a self-centered girl who held an axe in each hand. As the girl came to know him as "Crab," Duel-GX's circuits began activating.
dictionary.fusion:
ENERGY INPUT CONFIRMED.
OUTPUT CAPACITY INCREASED.
dictionary.summon:
NEW MASTER DETECTED.
REGISTRATION COMPLETE.
PLEASE INPUT COMMANDS.

leader skill.desc: 確率で防御貫通効果を付与
leader skill.name: 破壊の衝動

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を超絶アップ・攻撃に闇属性を付与
bb.name: 破壊モードII

dictionary.description: A mechanical figure that appeared in Grand Gaia to defeat that which destroyed the world in which it was created. It came to be known by the pet name Crab by Michele and the rest of those around it. Despite his emotionless nature as a mechanical figure, when his friends were in danger he drastically changed. As she looked upon his incredibly powerful new form, Michele smiled bitterly as she said, "You were cuter as a 'crab' than you are now as a 'scorpion!'"
dictionary.evolution:
UNEXPECTED ERROR.
VERSION UPGRADE
COMMENCING.
dictionary.fusion:
MAINTENANCE COMPLETE.
MAX OUTPUT INCREASED.
dictionary.summon:
DEFENSE TARGET CONFIRMED.
REMOVING ENEMY TARGETS.

leader skill.desc: 確率で防御貫通効果を付与
leader skill.name: 破壊神の誘い

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を超絶アップ・攻撃に闇属性を付与
bb.name: 破壊モードIII

dictionary.description: In the battle with Melchio's renewed form, this mechanical figure first clung to Michele like a scared puppy as she lay on the ground. However, when she tossed it off her and cursed its cowardice, it must have damaged its limiting circuits, for the machine soon transformed into a formidable weapon bent on destroying their enemy. Detecting that their foe was wielding an incredible destructive force of its own, Duel-SGX activated a hidden program. This time it wasn't following orders. It was acting on its own volition, its desire to protect its friends.
dictionary.evolution:
FATAL ERROR.
CODE 666
EXECUTION COMMENCING.
dictionary.fusion:
TUNING COMPLETE.
PERFORMANCE UPGRADE
CONFIRMED.
dictionary.summon:
MICHELE'S VOICE LOG SAVED.
READ-WRITE PERMISSIONS
RESTRICTED TO DUEL-SGX.

leader skill.desc: 確率で防御貫通効果を付与＆全てのユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 破壊神の激震

sbb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を超絶アップ・攻撃に闇属性を付与
sbb.name: ワールドエンド

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性６連ダメージ＆高確率で毒状態にする
bb.name: ポイズンフォール

dictionary.description: A gigantic arachnid demon that digs its nest underground. Not the usual kind of spider, this abomination is actually believed to have been born from a type of demon species. Since the entrance to its nest is cleverly hidden under dirt and dried leaves, it sprays its web from underground to trap any creatures passing by. With a web tougher than steel itself, it brings its prey into its nest and slowly melts the living creature alive with its digestive juices.
dictionary.fusion:
*Creak* *creak*
Kssh...
dictionary.summon:
*Creak* *creak*
Kssh...Kssh!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、カルマ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の輝き

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性７連ダメージ＆高確率で毒状態にする
bb.name: ディメントフォール

dictionary.description: The queen of gigantic arachnid demons. It is believed that she is the one to give birth to all the spider demons found living around. However, common spiders do not grow into this queen, so it is still unclear as to how this queen comes to be born. She can understand human speech, so it is possible that she can come to an understanding with people. However, she only thinks about digesting humans as food, so the mutual understanding may not happen at all. There are also rumors which state that she kidnaps young girls, but the reason behind this is unknown.
dictionary.evolution:
Ahh...
It's like I'm finally free.
It feels good.
dictionary.fusion:
Ooh!
It gives me shivers...
This feels nice.
dictionary.summon:
Welcome, Summoner.
I'll teach you lots of things.
Why don't you come closer?

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、カルマ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の輝き

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性７連ダメージ
bb.name: 魔炎剣

dictionary.description: A girl with a human mother and demon father. Having lost both her parents at an early age Lira spent her days living in a demon village even despite the harsh gazes she received from those around her. Doing everything she could as a demon in order to survive, one day she was given a new responsibility. She was to defeat the White Beast. Apathetic as always, Lira headed out with Golem, which she had received from her father, to face the White Beast.
dictionary.fusion:
I must become a strong demon.
Please, give me more power!
dictionary.summon:
I am Lira, a half blood!
You should fear me!
However, if you don't...

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 悪疫の波紋

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性９連ダメージ
bb.name: 魔喰炎斬

dictionary.description: A girl with a human mother and demon father. As a demon she challenged the White Beast, but during her fight she couldn't completely ignore her human half. Lost, having given up on the only life she'd ever known, she was asked by the White Beast to help vanquish a disastrous beast. With Golem, which her father had left behind, by her side as always, she bravely nodded as if this were her chance to make up for her sins.
dictionary.evolution:
I understand now.
All that flows inside of me,
it all makes up who I am...
dictionary.fusion:
The stronger I get,
the more demonic I feel.
But still, as part human...
dictionary.summon:
I am Lira, a magistra.
I'm both demon and human.
How do I appear to you?

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 悪疫の蔓延

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１１連ダメージ
bb.name: 魔神喰炎斬

dictionary.description: The daughter of a human mother and a demon father. Watching from the house her father left her as the humans lived in peace, one day Lira came across a journal. It was filled with loving words between her mother and father. As the gods' invasion began, Lira, along with her improved magical puppet, headed to the battlefield to protect the world that her parents so loved. Lira is recorded by the humans as being like a god eater, having buried countless numbers of gods.
dictionary.evolution:
I was dearly loved once.
That experience made me strong!
Will you take care of me too?
dictionary.fusion:
If I don't fight,
even more blood will be spilled.
I need to be strong!
dictionary.summon:
Demon, human, god, I don't care!
I am Lira!
I will protect the world I love!

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生＆全てのユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 悪疫神の力

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な闇属性１３連ダメージ＆自分のクリティカル率をアップ
sbb.name: ヴァルナメレス

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性６連ダメージ（ダメージの一部を吸収）
bb.name: ヴィクティムソウル

dictionary.description: A twin sword wielding knight, loyal to the Bariura Empire. Originally a fairly ordinary knight who was worth little more than his serious attitude, his blind dedication to his country led him to give into Shida's request, resulting in him being completely transformed. He gained tremendous fighting strength, but found himself in Shida's secret army under his direct control. Following Shida's orders he then began investigating a demon that had appeared nearby, believing that by doing so he could fulfill the promise he made with his long-lost friend to become the empire's greatest swordsman.
dictionary.fusion:
I require more power.
It matters not how I acquire it.
I have a promise to keep.
dictionary.summon:
You summoned me?
Do you know how to use this
power given to me by Shida?

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に強力な闇属性７連ダメージ（ダメージの一部を吸収）
bb.name: メフィストソウル

dictionary.description: A twin sword wielding knight, transformed by the dark magician Shida. Per Shida's orders he went off to investigate the appearance of a demon. Along the way he got into a little skirmish with a band of misfits after the same demon as he was including a cyborg and an obnoxious martial artist, but he soon found his target among some ruins within the empire. There he found the band of misfits he had fought before down and defeated, and though the demon also seemed exhausted he took up his twin swords and, with the intent of fulfilling his promise, released a furious attack.
dictionary.evolution:
Nngh. The pain...
It's fine, I know I must bear
it if I'm to become stronger.
dictionary.fusion:
I have to keep fighting if I'm to
keep my promise to my friend.
Give me more power!
dictionary.summon:
Do you not fear me?
I guess I could use these blades
of mine for your sake as well.

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光神の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に強力な闇属性１３連ダメージ（ダメージの一部を吸収）
bb.name: デモンズソウル

dictionary.description: A twin sword wielding knight, transformed by the dark magician Shida. Discovering that the man inside the demonic armor he was after was indeed his long-lost friend, he let him escape. When he returned, he reluctantly allowed the magician to use a piece of the armor to transform him further, "in order to save his friend." When the gods invaded, the sight of him slaying one after another while clad in black armor proved one thing: his friend wasn't the one who was cursed.
dictionary.evolution:
Nngh. My head...
What am I losing
in order to gain this strength?
dictionary.fusion:
Each time I grow stronger,
I forget something.
Something dear to me.
dictionary.summon:
You summoned me,
knowing there's blood on my hands.
In that case, I'm all yours.

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を６５％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光統神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１６連ダメージ＆３ターン、自分の防御力を半減し、攻撃力を超絶アップ
sbb.name: 魔界の棺

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１４連ダメージ＆確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
bb.name: アグレアスソウル

extra skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを回復＆ＨＰを少し吸収
extra skill.name: 呪われし炎鎧

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を１００％アップ・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆高確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 五光蝕神の悪疫

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１８連ダメージ＆３ターン、自分の防御力を半減し、攻撃力を超絶アップ＆味方全体に３ターン、被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
sbb.name: 魔炎傀の棺

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な闇属性２１連ダメージ＆味方全体の最大ＨＰをかなりアップ＆３ターン、最大ＨＰに応じて攻撃力をかなりアップ
ubb.name: 魔傀『魂双灼崩』

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: ブラッディークロス

dictionary.description: A soldier who led the civilians from the Bariura Empire during the last stages of the war with the gods in hopes of finding a new land. Known by everyone in the Bariura Empire, he sought to implement the same migratory movement of the neighboring countries within the empire. However, the nobility of the empire dismissed his idea, and branding him a coward, stripped him of his knighthood. Disappointed in his motherland, he led only a part of the empire in search of a new land with his beloved twin blades in hand.
dictionary.fusion:
You're gonna make me stronger?
If it's for my people,
I'll gladly accept.
dictionary.summon:
Are you the one
who will bring peace to the people?
If so, I'll devote my dual blades to you!

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが６属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 六極の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: ブラックデスペリア

dictionary.description: A soldier who led the civilians from the Bariura Empire during the last stages of the war with the gods in hopes of finding a new land. Leading the people of the Bariura Empire towards El Gaia in search of refuge, his party merged with Reed's. However, arguing over which course to take led them to a confrontation which would end in a duel. The fight is said to have lasted an entire day, though its outcome is undisclosed. In spite of this, it is said that they made an outstanding team on the battlefield, even while quarreling with each other.
dictionary.evolution:
Looks like you made a lot of sacrifices
to make me stronger.
Now I can't afford to let you down!
dictionary.fusion:
I wonder what was sacrificed
to make me stronger.
I will fight with that in mind as well.
dictionary.summon:
Sacrifices must be made
to get something in return.
It's natural.
That guy knew that too!

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが６属性以上で攻撃力を７５％アップ
leader skill.name: 六極神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: ブラッドシェイプアーク

dictionary.description: A soldier who led the civilians from the Bariura Empire during the last stages of the war with the gods in hopes of finding a new land. After arriving to Lucius's gate and trying to get the refugees to cross over, some of the people still behind were suddenly attacked by a disciple. When Reed and Lucana tried to go help the group under attack, Eru told them that their roles in this mission were not yet over, ultimately going to the group's rescue alone. As he fought off the God Army he is said to have muttered to himself that "copying that idiot may not be so bad," though his whereabouts following said battle remain unknown.
dictionary.evolution:
I'll rise above myself to protect
everyone. That choice is what led
me to reach his level!
dictionary.fusion:
I'll keep growing stronger.
I must grow stronger.
That's the role I've been given.
dictionary.summon:
The fact that you still live
is proof of our past struggle.
I will exhaust all my power for you!

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが６属性以上で攻撃力を１００％アップ
leader skill.name: 六極神の剛力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ出現率をアップ・被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
sbb.name: ファントムエリミネイター

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性９連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 円舞剣

leader skill.desc: 戦闘開始から２ターン、攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: ラピッドストリーム

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１２連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 三星衝

leader skill.desc: 戦闘開始から２ターン、攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: ラピッドストリーム

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性７連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: チェルノボグ

dictionary.description: One of the 12 Guardians of the Gods, protectors of the land of the gods. Friends with Sodis and his younger brother since childhood, it is theorized that she held a special interest in the older Sodis. Once he was selected to to be in the Guardians, she worked towards getting in as well. Though she was known for her ability to manipulate shadows as well as her magnificent lance wielding abilities, she was also very family-oriented and thoughtful, and it's said she was the mother figure of the 12 Guardians.
dictionary.fusion:
Thank you.
Take care of yourself, too.
You'll regret it if you don't.
dictionary.summon:
I'm Lunaris, one of the Guardians.
Me, a mother figure?
I'm not that old, you know!

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性９連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: タナトス

dictionary.description: One of the 12 Guardians, wielding a lance and the power to manipulate shadows. Thinking there's a chance there was just some misunderstanding, upon hearing of Sodis' betrayel she did her best to calmly assess the situation. However, after seeing Farlon wounded and finding out how many others had defected as well, she came to accept the insurrection was real. Sad that Sodis hadn't requested her council at all, Lunaris was encouraged by Sodis' younger brother and it's said she decided to defeat the traitors as a member of the Guardians.
dictionary.evolution:
I see, so you want me
to fight too, don't you?
Let me show you what I've got!
dictionary.fusion:
Power is something that
probably shouldn't exist at all.
Sorry, forget what I said...
dictionary.summon:
Did I make the wrong decision?
I've decided to go along with you
to figure out the truth.
