leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１１連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: ヒュプノス

dictionary.description: One of the 12 Guardians, wielding a lance and the power to manipulate shadows. She chased after the traitor Sodis alongside his brother and her childhood friend, Alyut. She thought for a moment she might try to persuade the man who was so kind to her before, but she determined regardless of how he reacted the gods would never forgive him. As she gathered her magical power and prepared to release one of her hidden shadow techniques, she said, "If it must be done, then I shall do it," as she realized herself that she would clash swords with Sodis.
dictionary.evolution:
Regret has made me strong.
Realization has moved me forth.
I hate both, but both are me.
dictionary.fusion:
I wish only to shed my regrets.
I would do anything to avoid such
a tragedy happening again.
dictionary.summon:
I carry all my tears and regret!
And to you who have forgiven me,
I dedicate my strength!

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を６５％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇統神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
sbb.name: タルタロス

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１６連ダメージ＆確率で弱体・病気状態にする＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
bb.name: ヘルテロン

dictionary.description: One of the 12 Guardians, wielding a lance and the power to manipulate shadows. Lunaris's despair sprung from her failure to save the person she loved most, and ended with the pain of losing one of her closest friends at her own expense. Once everything came to its end, and Lunaris regained her consciousness, the most horrible of things awaited her. The outcome of the battle caused her to go berserk, releasing enough power to destroy everything around her. Once she had spent the last of it, she fell into a deep sleep where she dreamed of days long past.
dictionary.evolution:
You think despair is the end?
No, you're wrong.
Despair is what leads to madness...
dictionary.fusion:
Power is a scary thing...
You're troubled if you lack it,
and cursed if you have it...
I wonder what I wanted with it...
dictionary.summon:
Those driven by madness are powerful
because they fear nothing. But power
alone doesn't build a future...

extra skill.desc: 攻撃力・防御力・回復力を低下する効果を無効
extra skill.name: 闇夜に見る悪夢

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を１２０％アップ＆被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加・確率でＨＰを回復
leader skill.name: 闇葬瞑神の力

60316.name: 艶傀の瞑儚神ルナリス

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１９連ダメージ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効・確率で攻撃力・防御力を１ターン低下する効果を付与
sbb.name: ティルノローグ

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な闇属性２２連ダメージ＆ＯＤゲージを増加＆味方全体に３ターン、全属性の弱点属性ダメージを超絶アップ
ubb.name: マルチバース

bb.desc: 敵全体に光・闇属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与
bb.name: フューラージハード

dictionary.description: A mock unit modeled after Grahdens, one of the Summoner Elders who manages the Defense Bureau, the department in-charge of powerhouse organizations such as the Demon Slayer Division and regular army. It is said that in his youth, he explored Grand Gaia together with a Summoner known as "The First Summoner" when the gate first appeared. This Unit replicates his current powers, and, though it is said that his powers were even stronger at his peak, they're much stronger than an average Summoner's powers.
dictionary.fusion:
Ho ho ho!
You seek the aid of an old man?
You're a bold one, indeed.
dictionary.summon:
Ho ho ho!
I've seen what you can do.
I shall lend you my powers.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの全能力を２０％アップ＆光・闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 老神の威光

60324.name: 白銀の老神グラデンス

bb.desc: 敵全体に光・闇属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与
bb.name: ジュピターライズ

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Grahdens, one of the Summoner Elders. After a certain Summoner defeated the god Lucius, Summoners' Hall was finally able to realize its goal of becoming completely independent from the gods. However, this action caused demons to appear in both Grand Gaia and Elgaia. Thus, Grahdens resigned from his position in Summoners' Hall to face this crisis, and went to fight on the frontlines as a common Summoner. His powers immensely exceeded those of the young Summoners around him though.
dictionary.evolution:
Ho ho ho.
To think my body could get this light.
I need to sharpen up!
dictionary.fusion:
Never be satisfied with your current
condition, or you'll stop growing.
Wouldn't that be boring?
dictionary.summon:
Growing weaker because of age
is just a lousy excuse.
I just reached my prime!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの全能力を３５％アップ＆光・闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 老神の神気

60325.name: 白銀の冥神グラデンス

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光・闇属性２５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与・ターン毎にＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
sbb.name: クロノ＝ラスヴェート

dictionary.description: This magical creature is said to systemize and store all Dark-related knowledge that Metal Units can hold within them. A researcher has estimated that their memory capacity is no larger than that of a Metal God. However, where a Metal Unit lacks in the capability to process repetitive entities, Crystal Units are able to precisely organize such records. The density of the information they hold is said to be the reason why more experience can be gained out of them despite similarly reported capacity attributes.
dictionary.summon:
So you, too, seek power.
Save your efforts, lost fool.
Darkness always lurks behind.

60334.name: 闇のクリスタルゴッド

dictionary.description: An incarnation of the power of Darkness from another world. Legend has it these beings are the key to unlocking powers greater than those of the gods. On another world, an experiment was conducted to agglomerate high volumes of darkness. Trying to condense the dark power into negative levels, it gave birth to beings from naught. The experiment was then deemed a failure, and the creatures that resulted from it were sent back to the void they had come from. Today, darkness has the power to lay things to rest, allowing souls that have preserved their power to sublimate onto a higher plane. If one is able to control the power of a Mecha God, the power of limitless Darkness may become theirs.
dictionary.summon:
You summon the power of Darkness...
Are you prepared to consume
every last soul?

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: 闇の刃

dictionary.description: One of the 12 Guardians of the Gods, protectors of the land of the gods. This magician's seniority matched that of Sodis, and even his power was said to rival him. However he wasn't conceited in his strength and chose simply to carry out his own role, supporting the ever popular Sodis as he purposely remained a step behind. It's believed that this cool-headed and smart Guardian in fact served as an officer, and was highly regarded while Sodis stood as leader.
dictionary.fusion:
The basics of battle
lie in careful preparation.
You'd best not forget that.
dictionary.summon:
I will do my best to see through
to your true intentions.
In the meantime, I will assist you.

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 光の護り

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: 闇の神刃

dictionary.description: A former Guardian who rebelled against the gods. Hearing of Sodis' betrayel he immediately began looking for him, hoping to meet him face to face to hear his reasoning. Coming to believe in the righteousness of Sodis' cause, Zephyr left his side to collect information. Upon returning, Zephyr saw that more of his Guardians friends had joined him in believing in Sodis. He smiled in realizing that he had chosen the correct path.
dictionary.evolution:
My power has rapidly increased.
Don't be an incompitent Summoner
who relies only on power.
dictionary.fusion:
Half the battle lies in preparation.
You mustn't neglect this.
Do you understand what I mean?
dictionary.summon:
Can you predict what your
enemies will do next?
If so, I will assist you.

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 光の結界

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: 暗黒の神刃

dictionary.description: A former Guardian who rebelled against the gods. As the fighting between the 12 Guardians broke out, he continued his investigation into what Sodis had said about the gods planning to destroy the humans. Whether or not he found out the truth is unknown, but there is extremely little documentation concerning Zephyr after that point. One theory states that after attaining proof of the gods' invasion, Zephyr returned to find the battle between the Guardians had ended, and soon afterwards the army of gods began their attack.
dictionary.evolution:
This power to overcome all,
I just can't allow it.
I've still much more to investigate.
dictionary.fusion:
I have nothing to say.
This is because I have faith in
whatever you decide.
dictionary.summon:
I'll do absolutely everything I
can to assure you victory.
That is what I'm here for.

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減＆闇属性の弱点属性ダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 光神の断罪

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与＆３ターン、闇属性ユニットの攻撃力をアップ
sbb.name: ブラックネメシス

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に闇属性７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光属性を付与
bb.name: ソウルメロディー

dictionary.description: A musician who wanders through the Bariura Empire. Few are aware of the fact that he was once a cavalry leader. Noticing his prowess at mesmerizing others, a dark magician granted him the ability to manipulate their souls with his melodies. However, he loathes this power and keeps it and his swordsmanship buried inside him, and he has since distanced himself from the emperor he loved. Modifications to his body make him appear far younger than he actually is.
dictionary.fusion:
Didn't know it was so easy.
Becoming this powerful
feels a bit hollow...
dictionary.summon:
How do I look?
I know. Not too good.
Never mind... Forget it.

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光の力

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に強力な闇属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光属性を付与
bb.name: エタニティソウル

dictionary.description: A former cavalry leader who wanders through the Bariura Empire as a musician. An old friend of Magress' father, he has lent the hero advice on numerous occasions when he was blinded by his quest for revenge. Magress never noticed, however, for Eric's youthful appearance always fooled him. He even fought alongside the locals in the war against the gods, though his modifications were starting to distort his power and cause it to run wild unbeknownst to him.
dictionary.evolution:
Don't judge me by my looks.
I'll show you through my
actions that I've evolved.
dictionary.fusion:
Youngsters might get happy.
But this isn't something to
dance and shout about.
dictionary.summon:
I'm but a wandering minstrel.
Just here to add a little
hue to your journey...

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光神の力

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に強力な闇属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光属性を付与
bb.name: ヘブンズソウル

dictionary.description: A former cavalry leader who wanders through the Bariura Empire as a musician. When Magress took on the gods, he aided him from the shadows on numerous occasions. The more he used his altered powers, the stronger yet more uncontrollable they became. Though he despised his power, he used it to save others until his performances took on a life of their own. Legend has it his cursed melodies could possess the gods and force them to fight against each other.
dictionary.evolution:
Hmm... This is strange.
I hate this power, but it
invigorates me all the same.
dictionary.fusion:
My strength is multiplying...
But don't worry. I'm too
old to run wild again.
dictionary.summon:
Summoning is an interesting power.
Maybe I should protect you so
it doesn't consume you?

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 五光闘神の力

sbb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に強力な闇属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光属性を付与・ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
sbb.name: 天使と悪魔

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１５連ダメージ
bb.name: ディメンション

dictionary.description: One of the Four Fallen Gods, this Unit is believed to have been made in Cardes the Malevolent's image. Since information about Cardes could not be obtained after it had been sealed for a long time following its rampage, it was believed that a mock Unit based on him could not be produced. However, his name can be found in the chronicles of the four legendary warriors from Palmyna, proving his reappearance. Though he probably doesn't hold as much power as he did before, surely at least a portion of his menacing and godly powers can still be felt.
dictionary.fusion:
The path has closed...
But I shall open it with my power.
Power will become my only path.
dictionary.summon:
My soul has been reborn once again.
I'm interested in your power.
I'll follow you for now.

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動時のＢＢゲージの消費量を大幅に軽減＆光・闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを２０％軽減
leader skill.name: 統べる者の覇気

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性３３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力をアップ
sbb.name: エンドレス

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１５連ダメージ＆確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
bb.name: インフィニティワールド

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Zevalhua the Supreme, one of the Four Fallen Gods. After being defeated by a certain Summoner, Noel was able to gather enough information on Zevalhua to create this Unit. However, after this Fallen God's brutal battle with Afla Dilith, her condition was such that it has now rendered her unable to use the full extent of her powers. Similar to her disciple, Mare, Zevalhua also liked playing dirty on the battlefield, though she actually boasted of plenty of destructive power.
dictionary.fusion:
You know not the essence of power.
Therefore you grant it to me,
unaware of the path to ruin...
dictionary.summon:
I will not bow to any Summoner,
however strong they might be.
One day you shall kneel before me...

leader skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージをかなり増加・確率でＨＰを回復
leader skill.name: 神界の加護

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性３３連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力・防御力を１ターン低下
sbb.name: エンドレス

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎・水・樹・雷・闇属性１５連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: レゾネイトカオス

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after the Beast God Afla Dilith, one of the Four Fallen Gods. Though his appearance still resembles that of the castle he absorbed during a battle against a certain Summoner, this Afla Dilith no longer holds the power to absorb his enemies. The reason being that according to the developer, this mock Unit's power falls short when compared to the real thing. Legend says that it was considered the greatest honor to be absorbed by the Beast God, as he preferred facing only the strongest of opponents to merge into his own body for eternity.
dictionary.fusion:
Oh, so you are able to use powers
similar to my own? Interesting.
Bring me stronger warriors...
dictionary.summon:
Summoned into a mortal body...?
Very well. Show me your power.
Prove your worth to me...

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを７５％アップ＆ＨＰを少し吸収
leader skill.name: 真神の粛清

60445.name: 真神アフラ・ディリス

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性３３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージを大幅にアップ
sbb.name: エンドレス

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性６連ダメージ＆確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: アジュラ

dictionary.description: A god that was once imprisoned for having committed a grave crime. Originally the god in charge of judgment, his sternness was feared even by the other gods themselves. Once he became aware of Zellha's suspicious activities, he tried to stop her himself. However, Zellha had fed false information to the higher ranking gods, claiming that Kajah judged others based on his personal views, and was thus imprisoned unjustly. It is said that if there is one mistake he did make, it was doubting the fairness of his own judgment.
dictionary.fusion:
When you sacrifice something
in order to make yourself stronger,
it's extremely sinful.
dictionary.summon:
Are you someone who longs for judgment?
It doesn't matter who you are, you will be punished for you crimes!

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが２０％以下の時、攻撃力を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 魔王の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性８連ダメージ＆確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: デミュラ

dictionary.description: A god that was once imprisoned for having committed a grave crime. Originally the god in charge of judgment, he came to be known as an evil god after committing a crime himself. While imprisoned he learned that Zellha had descended to the battlefield, and concerned about the amount of damage that she could cause above ground, he asked a certain bad-mouthed, yet trustworthy, goddess to stop Zellha. Afterwards, during the great war between gods and men, he received orders from the higher ranking gods and followed them to the letter without any complaints or remarks.
dictionary.evolution:
I committed a common mistake.
But not judging it as such was my real mistake.
The gods' judgment is a necessity.
dictionary.fusion:
Gods that are summoned by humans...
I see it now.
This is the punishment I must bear.
dictionary.summon:
So you need my power to judge others?
Listen human, you might be the one that gets judged himself.

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが２５％以下の時、攻撃力を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 魔神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１０連ダメージ＆確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: グラデメギラ

dictionary.description: A god that was once imprisoned for having committed a grave crime. During the great war against the humans he learned that the goddess Zellha set off to the oppressed Bariura Empire in order to settle a personal grudge. Fearing total chaos and annihilation of the area, Kajah prevented her from entering the empire, leaving him to carry out the same role in her stead. Having exposed himself as the god of judgment, he then had to strictly judge a great number of criminals and sinners mercilessly. He was greatly feared by many.
dictionary.evolution:
According to our contract,
let's release the evil that is my power!
We should move forward holding onto our crimes.
dictionary.fusion:
The secret art of Fusion that was created by humans...
It is incredible, yet terrifying.
I wonder if it changed the way humans were judged.
dictionary.summon:
If I was able to come back to this world...
it must mean that you need my powers of judgment.
Let's punish all criminals!

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが３０％以下の時、攻撃力を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 魔統神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１５連ダメージ＆高確率で怪我状態にする
sbb.name: マグネス＝ネビル

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１０連ダメージ＆確率で毒・呪い状態にする
bb.name: エクスディメンジョン

dictionary.description: A disciple of the divine emperor Zevalhua. In the battle against the god Afla Dilith, she fought in her master's stead, invading his dreaded Agni Region to take on the Summoners. A master of deception, she set countless traps and was beyond ecstatic when they captured their targets. Though extremely skilled at combat, her obsession with the results of her cunningness sometimes gets the better of her.
dictionary.fusion:
So that's summoning, eh?
Looks impressive when
a weakling like you does it.
dictionary.summon:
I'm being punished...
No way a human like
you could summon me!

leader skill.desc: 全属性の弱点属性ダメージをかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 王者の蹂躙

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１２連ダメージ＆確率で毒・呪い状態にする
bb.name: エーテルディザスター

dictionary.description: A disciple of the divine emperor Zevalhua. She abandoned the traps she set to thrust herself into battle. Though humiliated that her traps were a failure, she is an incredible sight on the battlefield, converting her frustration into pure fighting strength. One blow from her staff could send a regular beast flying into oblivion. Do not let yourself be seduced by her vixen-like appearance. It will be the path to your downfall.
dictionary.evolution:
The humiliation...
You'll pay for
seeing me like this...
dictionary.fusion:
Revealing everything to me,
your enemy?
Let's see how long you last.
dictionary.summon:
Summoning me in
this form?!
Will my humiliation ever end?

leader skill.desc: 全属性の弱点属性ダメージを大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の蹂躙

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加・被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: 女帝の童戯

dictionary.description: Long before the battle between the humans and the gods, there was a fearful empress from the Agni empire whose name was inscribed in history. Although she was a first-class dark sorceress, for some reason she had a battle coliseum built immediately following her coronation. It is believed that this coliseum was used to experiment using human strife to strengthen the dark sorceress. It is said that the faint smile painted on the empress's face as she watched the atrocious battles in the coliseum was considered a thing of beauty by the masses.
dictionary.fusion:
Being used by someone inferior
might not be so bad...
I could turn this into further research.
dictionary.summon:
You who have called me forth...
I have no interest in you.
But this may help me kill some time...

leader skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: 戦神の咆哮

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加・被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: 弑神の御遊

dictionary.description: Long before the battle between the humans and the gods, there was a fearful empress from the Agni empire whose name was inscribed in history. After some years had passed, her passion for watching slaves fight each other became aberrant. An example of her abnormal obsession: she created a crown which she made her slaves wear. The crown was able to increase the attack power of the wearer, but was also the result of part of her research. Also, at the same time it strengthened her dark powers more than ever before.
dictionary.evolution:
Take a good look at my evolved form.
The passion people feel in the battlefield
fuels my power.
dictionary.fusion:
You should make me an offering soon.
It will nurture my power.
It should be cheap enough.
dictionary.summon:
A human who can manipulate summons...
I'm a bit more interested in you now.
Kneel before me.

leader skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 戦神の激昂

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加・被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: 大弑神の憂晴

dictionary.description: Long before the battle between the humans and the gods, there was a fearful empress from the Agni empire whose name was inscribed in history. Some years after her enthronement she began invading the neighboring countries. It is rumored that she did so in order to gather more slave fighters, but this cannot be proven as fact. There were some slaves who aimed to take her life, but due to the tremendous dark power she gained through her research, none could approach her. After her death, her daughter would continue this same research, bringing down the fall of the empire with it.
dictionary.evolution:
My evolution was only natural.
That's because I'm a fool
who cannot help fighting.
dictionary.fusion:
I could feel your loyalty
towards me.
What do you wish for as a reward?
dictionary.summon:
The saga of a relentless person.
Humans are equivalent to beasts.
In my eyes, everyone is equal.

leader skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 戦神の激動

60495.name: 大弑神リリー・マター

sbb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加・被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加・ＢＣ出現率をアップ
sbb.name: グランド・マター

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性７連ダメージ
bb.name: ブレイドストライク

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇神の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性８連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: ダークインパクト

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇創神の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性１０連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: デスストライク

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 闇創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性８連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: スカーレットリーパー

dictionary.description: The second imperial princess of the Bariura Empire, and the only one of Alice's sisters who actually shares the same mother. She showed great ability and brilliance since infancy, thus a lot came to be expected from her in the future. However, she apparently committed a sin when she tried to protect her younger sister from a sinister plot by her relatives to take over the throne, and was imprisoned for a long time. Knowing that she was being falsely accused, the emperor kept her imprisoned anyway, but would sometimes have her carry out missions in absolute secrecy. She was released just before the great war with the gods, but the emperor commanded her to protect Alice over his own self.
dictionary.fusion:
You have my thanks.
I need this power.
Power to help that child...
dictionary.summon:
I don't need freedom...
As long as she is free.
Who are you?
Not that it matters...

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の光

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性９連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: ソウルイクリプス

dictionary.description: The second imperial princess of the Bariura Empire and Alice's older sister. Ordered by her father, the emperor, to protect Alice over himself, he gave her a great scythe that consumed the souls of the dead. However, she was strictly forbidden to reveal her existence to her sister Alice. After her imprisonment, she continued worrying about her sister, ultimately becoming her shadow and protecting her out of pure devotion. She had no idea of her father's intentions of making both her and her sister more powerful through weaponry.
dictionary.evolution:
My scythe whispers to me.
It craves more souls.
You're just like this scythe too...
dictionary.fusion:
My scythe is resonating...
What did you sacrifice?
What do you want from me?
dictionary.summon:
Sinning doesn't scare me...
As long as she smiles.
Can you help that child?

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の威光

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１３連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: グリムクリーヴァ

dictionary.description: The second imperial princess of the Bariura Empire and Alice's older sister. Facing Alice's dead body lying cold on the battlefield, Elza blamed herself for her sister's death. However, at that moment she remembered the hidden power of the great scythe her father, the emperor, had given her. This power chips away at the heart of the user while collecting a vast amount of souls, allowing the user to revive any deceased person of their choice. It is unclear as to whether the great scythe wielding figure that appeared in the battlefield next was a god or a human, and even less clear as to which of the sisters it could have possibly been.
dictionary.evolution:
No matter my form,
I am who I am.
I'll wield this scythe
to protect that child...
dictionary.fusion:
You're just like father...
What will you do with me
once I've become stronger?
dictionary.summon:
I won't let her get hurt...
I will protect her forever.
Even if everyone turns against me.

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の覇光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性３０連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ
sbb.name: エクスターミネイション

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性３０連ダメージ＆確率で怪我・呪い状態にする＆味方のＢＢゲージをかなり増加＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージを大幅にアップ
bb.name: グリムラビリンス

extra skill.desc: ＢＢ及びＳＢＢに「２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与」を追加＆ＨＰを少し吸収
extra skill.name: 冥界に眠りし力

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ＆全てのユニットの攻撃力を８０％アップ＆スパーク時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加・ＨＰを回復
leader skill.name: 戦蝕界神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性４０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で怪我・呪いを発生する効果を付与・スパークダメージを大幅にアップ・ターン毎にＨＰを大回復・ＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
sbb.name: アビサルターミネイション

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な闇属性４４連ダメージ＆確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージを超絶アップ＆２ターン、光属性ユニットからの被ダメージを超絶軽減
ubb.name: メモリシア

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をアップ
bb.name: 魔操術・始『黒霞み』

dictionary.description: An assassin rumored to take on any job as long as the reward was worth it. Though he demanded exorbitant amounts of money for his services, he was known to carry out his missions without fail, and was thus considered a very valuable asset. No one could match Kuda's assassin skills, which came to life through his whip-like sword. Kuda's name and prowess were so renowned that describing him as a mere "assassin" would not do them justice. However, since no one who saw his face ever survived to tell the tale, this information is all mere speculation.
dictionary.fusion:
Is this part of my payment?
Well...I guess I'll take it.
dictionary.summon:
First, show me how much
you're gonna pay me.
Then we can talk about work.

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減
leader skill.name: 王者の魔力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をアップ
bb.name: 魔操術・次『闇撥ね』

dictionary.description: An assassin rumored to have served the God Army. When the war with the gods started, Kuda suddenly began assassinating influential people from all countries. At first some believed these were regular jobs given specifically to Kuda, but later rumors that the gods had been the ones to order these assassinations from Kuda, promising to leave him as the sole human survivor at the end of the war, began to spread. It is said that no one knows if these rumors were spread by the gods, or if Kuda let the secret out himself due to a guilty conscience.
dictionary.evolution:
Is this a reward too?
Advance payment is quite
generous of you.
dictionary.fusion:
If you wanna keep using my services,
then you better keep these rewards coming.
dictionary.summon:
So? How do you expect to pay
for my services?

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減
leader skill.name: 覇王の魔力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をアップ
bb.name: 魔操術・終『神無し』

dictionary.description: An assassin employed by a mysterious knight. It is written that he carried out several assassination attempts on one of the Six Heroes, Atro. Near the end of the war, Atro had been preoccupied with the dilemma of his broken sword after having fought so earnestly. However, it is unclear as to why Kuda stopped his pursuit of the hero during this time, going as far as purposely distancing himself from him. At one point in the war, sections of the armies from each country seemed to have had intel on the movements of the God Army. Some legends say that this is the reason why Kuda joined the God Army in the first place, infiltrating it in order to gain valuable information.
dictionary.evolution:
Nice.
I'll give you a special offer.
On my assassin services, I mean.
dictionary.fusion:
You don't need collateral, you say?
Doesn't matter.
I just do what I was paid to.
dictionary.summon:
I don't have anything to say.
I just do what I want.
Always have, always will.

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量をかなり軽減
leader skill.name: 統神の魔力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性２４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ・攻撃力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: 裏魔操術『黄泉』

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１１連ダメージ＆確率で弱体・怪我状態にする
bb.name: レイヴンフラクチャー

dictionary.description: The disciple of the god Afla Dilith. He has the tendency to acknowledge the strength of those who possess it, regardless of their race. This does not mean that he considers them as equals, but rather that they have the potential to become valuable subordinates for himself. Using his underlings to fight on the battlefield, he is rarely seen at the front lines. However, it is said that during his battle with the servants of the last Fallen God, Zevalhua, this disciple attacked with his own power for once, dying enemy after enemy bright red with their own blood.
dictionary.fusion:
Human.
Do you seek more power
though you live so sinfully?
dictionary.summon:
If you could enslave me,
you must really possess
terrifying powers.

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが多いほど、攻撃力をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 黒の神気

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１３連ダメージ＆確率で弱体・怪我状態にする
bb.name: ダークネスメテオ

dictionary.description: The disciple of the god Afla Dilith, who only reveals himself when determined to eliminate an enemy. Completely different from his usual calm demeanor, he will continue fighting relentlessly until his enemies have been completely eradicated. Relying on his physical strength rather than on magic and weapons, it is said that he was feared even by his comrades. With complete faith and loyalty to his master, Afla Dilith, he lives only to serve him by pulverizing enemies with his godly fists.
dictionary.evolution:
My power
is Lord Afla Dilith's.
But I'll lend it to you,
just this once.
dictionary.fusion:
Forgetting your vile past
to gain even more power?
You'll pay for that someday.
dictionary.summon:
You could summon me
in this form?
It seems I may have
underestimated you.

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが多いほど、攻撃力を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 漆黒の神気

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: ドレインスピア

leader skill.desc: 確率で防御貫通効果を付与＆ＢＣ出現率を超絶アップ
leader skill.name: ダルカの悪魔

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１１連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復＆３ターン、攻撃に闇属性を付与
bb.name: 百花乱舞

leader skill.desc: 確率で防御貫通効果を付与＆ＢＣ出現率を超絶アップ
leader skill.name: ダルカの悪魔

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１０連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力を１ターン低下
bb.name: ソーサリーワンド

dictionary.description: A magician from the Bariura Empire belonging to the special military force supervised directly by Shida. Though her personality was gentle, her beloved demonic lantern is said to have held a great amount of dark power. Due to her lantern's ability to absorb and materialize any surrounding chemical elements, Shida took a particular interest in Lumie and had her help him conduct confidential experiments in absolute secrecy. Their research progressed at a faster rate than they had initially expected, but Lumie distanced herself from it all shortly afterwards to conduct her on experiments.
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel my lantern's will...
If it keeps absorbing dark power,
I don't know what will happen.
dictionary.summon:
Are you keen on my lantern or me?
I'll show you lots of spirits
to celebrate our meeting.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をアップ
leader skill.name: 魔灯の揺らめき

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１２連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力を１ターン低下＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰをかなり回復・ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
sbb.name: グルーム・シアー

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１３連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力を１ターン低下
bb.name: ソーサリーミラージュ

dictionary.description: A magician from the Bariura Empire who began using forbidden arts after she came to believe that her country was destined for ruin during the last stages of the great war with the gods. Determined to use magic in order to travel to another world, she released all of the demonic power hidden within her lantern, and opened a portal to Ishgria. She then disappeared from Bariura without telling a single soul. However, she had no idea that someone had been watching her with a smile. No further records of her life in Ishgria have been found so far.
dictionary.evolution:
Things went faster than expected.
But that's fine.
I'll show you my true self...
dictionary.fusion:
I guess I should compliment you.
These little ones we've created
have become pretty formidable.
dictionary.summon:
The same old thing is boring, right?
Same places, same people.
Hehe, it's not meant to sound deep.

extra skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
extra skill.name: 魔晶灯の煌き

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 魔燈姫の心動

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１５連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力を１ターン低下＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを大回復・ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
sbb.name: グロウ・メインズ

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な闇属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で攻撃力を１ターン大幅に低下する効果を付与・被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを超絶増加
ubb.name: ソウル・カルナシオン

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ
bb.name: スレッジランブル

dictionary.description: The daughter of a nobleman from the Amdahl Empire. Though she boasted of great skill with the demon flail her father had given her, she let herself be captured in order to help the twin princesses escape when Amdahl was invaded by Palmyna. She then developed a deep grudge against those who sought to steal away her country, and broke out of the prison using the strong physique she had inherited from her father. Once outside, she targeted Palmyna only to find that it had already been destroyed. Losing the reason behind the anger that had burned inside of her, she decided to fight against the God Army instead, using her demon flail to pulverize the gods.
dictionary.fusion:
You use quite the interesting power,
but it still relies on people.
It's nothing to boast of.
dictionary.summon:
The insolent Summoner asking for my
help, is you? It would seem I
can't escape my rotten luck...

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を４０％アップ＆スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 鉄姫の閃き

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な闇属性ダメージ＆確率で防御力を１ターン大幅に低下
sbb.name: 破壊の鉄球

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ
bb.name: スレッジグローブ

dictionary.description: The daughter of a nobleman from the Amdahl Empire, which was destroyed by the Kingdom of Palmyna. As her flail thirsted for revenge, she continued to pulverize the God Army without hesitation. However, when one of the gods felt threatened by her, she was teleported to Ishgria. After a sudden flash of light she saw a land full of chaos spread before her. Assuming she had reached the land of the dead, she set off to find the relatives she had lost when Amdahl fell with frustration written on her face. The paths she walked were all decorated by the corpses of the demons she pulverized along the way.
dictionary.evolution:
So you want to see the real me?
You're a curious one indeed.
Would you like me to crush you? Hehe.
dictionary.fusion:
You seem to understand my taste.
I think of you a bit more highly now.
Just a tad bit.
dictionary.summon:
I know the past is unchangeable.
But I want to believe we can let
it go in lieu of a happy future.

extra skill.desc: 攻撃ＢＢの威力を大幅にアップ
extra skill.name: 怨潰による復讐劇

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を８０％アップ＆スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 鋼鉄姫の閃煌

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な闇属性２連ダメージ＆確率で防御力を１ターン大幅に低下
sbb.name: 覇界の魔鋼球

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な闇属性２０連ダメージ＆１ターン、自分のスパークダメージを超絶アップ
ubb.name: ドレッドノート

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復
bb.name: フューチャーソング

dictionary.description: A songstress who appeared from another world. There are records left behind that state she appeared in the same ancient ruins as Hatsune Miku, singing atop a peculiar stage. Her voice is said to have healed many people as well, but the curious thing was that she sang in an entirely different language than Hatsune Miku. The language seemed to be from another world, rendering the lyrics incomprehensible. However, the mystical resonance of her voice is said to have changed the souls of her audience, sublimating their existence.
dictionary.fusion:
You're showing me kindness?
I guess that's not so bad.
I should be able to sing again now.
dictionary.summon:
You want to stand on stage with me?
Fine. I want to see what you see,
so I'll allow it.

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ出現率を大幅にアップ＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: ノーヴルスマイル

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復
bb.name: トワイライトシャドウ

dictionary.description: A songstress who appeared from another world. Rumor has it that she appeared within the same ancient ruins where Hatsune Miku was found, quickly amassing a large number of audience members who grew captivated by her voice. Her ability to sing in mysterious languages made her especially popular amongst other singers of her time. Sweet and innocent, her music moved the hearts of many, filling their existence with joyous harmony. And though her voice was cool and husky, many claim that her feminine charm as a singer was a lovely sight to behold.
dictionary.evolution:
A sweet melody has stirred my heart.
Won't you sing along with me?
dictionary.fusion:
What is this music ringing in my ears?
I feel like it's revitalizing me...
dictionary.summon:
The stage is bigger than I remember.
Guess that means there's more room to sing.
Well, here I go!

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ出現率を大幅にアップ＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: ノーヴルスマイル

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１７連ダメージ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復
bb.name: ソウルティアーズ

dictionary.description: A songstress who appeared from another world. Luka's special ability to sing in tongues yet unknown to the people of Grand Gaia caused a great stir amongst the masses that caused her fame to skyrocket. During this time she also acquired a special musical instrument used to compliment her voice on stage. It would be this combination which would ultimately cement her position as one of the most adored artists of her time. As her soothing voice echoed throughout the walls of the ancient ruins, a dark and mysterious glow is said to have lit the stage, as if emanating from her.
dictionary.evolution:
Your music has awakened
a powerful force within me.
My voice will be able to reach everyone now!
dictionary.fusion:
When you cheer me on,
the rhythm of my heart grows faster.
I wonder what that means...
dictionary.summon:
My music was meant to bring happiness
to this world. I hope you enjoy
this next song, Summoner.

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ出現率を大幅にアップ＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量を大幅にアップ＆被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを回復
leader skill.name: ヴィーナスベール

60585.name: 神舞奏姫 巡音ルカ

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰを大回復＆３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ
sbb.name: グローリーワールド

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与
bb.name: 匂紅梅

dictionary.description: A young human male with jet black wings. Fearing that he was the child of a demon, he was abandoned by his parents immediately after his birth. Fortunately, an old man found the discarded baby while wondering in the forest, and raised him as his own. This elder seems to have been from another world, but very little is known about him. He taught Ardin how to survive by equipping him with an otherworldly sword, and pushing him into sword fighting training. Once the elder lost his life to illness, Ardin set off on a lone journey with his sword in hand.
dictionary.fusion:
What is this, charity?!
What do you mean I can't refuse it?!
It must mean that I'm a prisoner...
dictionary.summon:
You want me to lend a hand?
Even when I look like this?
Hmph, you're an interesting one.

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与
bb.name: 散蓮華

dictionary.description: A vagrant with jet black wings. Wandering about aimlessly, he learned how to fence and use magic through his own self-taught training. He used his powers to save people in all regions, gaining more companions by the minute as he moved along. Most of his new allies are said to have been people who, like him, had been ostracized from society. When the invasion of the gods began, he set out to destroy the Fallen God Lagzal, but the god annihilated all of his comrades, leaving Ardin to grieve for them alone.
dictionary.evolution:
What a familiar feeling...
Is it a memory from my time with them?
Nah, I'm overthinking things.
dictionary.fusion:
If you're looking for compensation,
you might as well quit now.
I make promises to no one.
dictionary.summon:
Who dares summon me?!
Hahaha, just kidding.
I'll help you out!

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与
bb.name: 落紅葉

dictionary.description: A vagrant with jet black wings. Swearing revenge upon the Fallen God Lagzal after his comrades were slain, he headed to the Underground Lake to make good on his vow through a decisive battle. However, it is said that he did not deliver a finishing blow to the god, but rather sealed him away. The idea behind this remains a mystery, but some speculate that the reason he was born with black wings may point to a special connection with the gods that justifies his pacifist action. Nonetheless, the only thing certain is that he never showed himself again afterwards.
dictionary.evolution:
Something has awaken inside of me.
But still, I...
I want to go on as my human self!
dictionary.fusion:
I will only give you my thanks.
Don't expect more than that.
Just let me do what I want.
dictionary.summon:
Divine blood doesn't matter to me.
I am who I am.
I won't be tied down, sorry.

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ＆ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減
leader skill.name: 五光魔神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１８連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力を１ターン大幅に低下＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与
sbb.name: 咲椿

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１３連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする＆確率で攻撃力を１ターン大幅に低下
bb.name: ファントムカース

dictionary.description: A demon who was active in Grand Gaia. Unaffiliated with the servants of the Four Fallen Gods, he made appearances in numerous places, trifling with Summoners as he went along. Although he boasted of a sly personality and great abilities, he was not the type to prefer direct confrontation, but rather opted for the use of traps to fight his targets. He fought with the leader of the 24th Demon Slayers Division "Rebel Lance," Karl, countless times, gradually deteriorating the troop. However, his reasons behind attacking the same division over and over again remain a mystery.
dictionary.fusion:
Fusion, power transcending humans.
Heh heh heh...
What a curious technique...
dictionary.summon:
A human who summons demons?
How interesting indeed.
I shall accompany you for a short while.

leader skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加＆確率で被ダメージの１５％を相手に反射する
leader skill.name: 狡神の画策

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１７連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする＆確率で攻撃力を１ターン大幅に低下
bb.name: メフィストフェレス

dictionary.description: A demon who was active in Grand Gaia. Though Graham usually spoke in a very composed and polite manner, when angered his personality changed completely. After coercing his foes through his words of indifference and attitude, he would rob them of their lives with a powerful attack. And though his origins and goals remain unknown, he did once receive patronage from Maxwell's disciple, Abaddon, and was an obvious enemy of all Summoners. Due to this, it is believed that he had some sort of connection with the gods.
dictionary.evolution:
So, you have awakened my rage.
And you continue to fear
that my power is not suitable for you.
dictionary.fusion:
What a foolish thing to do,
giving magic to a demon.
I despise your greed.
dictionary.summon:
Humans fear false demons.
They have no idea
of what a real demon is.

leader skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージをかなり増加＆確率で被ダメージの２０％を相手に反射する
leader skill.name: 狡神の謀略

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加・攻撃力を少しアップ
bb.name: ゴーストハンド

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減＆被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 知識の泉

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加・攻撃力をアップ
bb.name: ダークスターフォール

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減＆被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 知識の泉

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で毒・呪いを発生する効果を付与
bb.name: カオスクラック

dictionary.description: A demon of unknown origin whose motives and actions still remain a mystery. Announcing himself as the one to "destroy the world through chaos," he is said to have descended to the human realm with the desire to fight strong opponents. He defeated many a person with his sickle, but every time he would leave exclaiming that his opponent had been the wrong one. Wondering through Grand Gaia, Iidor heard rumors of a dormant dragon and a knight. Upon stumbling into this information, he smiled deciding to hasten the plot.
dictionary.fusion:
You're giving me power?
Do you really have
that much energy to spare?
dictionary.summon:
Human.
Do you plan to unleash me in this world?
Your race is still as foolish as ever.

leader skill.desc: 確率でＨＰを少し吸収
leader skill.name: 混沌の奪魂

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で毒・呪いを発生する効果を付与
bb.name: ネクロハザード

dictionary.description: A demon claiming to be the "destroyer of the world through chaos." Waking an ancient sleeping dragon, he made sure that it destroyed the whole of Bariura. Ignoring the queen's plea to stop such destruction, Varfed watched with a smile like none he had shown before as Arus drew his sword against the dragon. The demon immediately fed the dragon his power, turning the creature against the enraged knight and the queen. However, it is said that another knight showed herself all of the sudden, helping the queen and the blazing knight to escape.
dictionary.evolution:
So, I've evolved.
However, this is not enough.
My wish must become a reality...
dictionary.fusion:
Human...I am grateful.
This is because you've chosen to grant power
even to the likes of me.
dictionary.summon:
I have grown more curious
about what you seek. Heh heh,
I shall pledge myself to you.
For now.

leader skill.desc: 確率でＨＰを少し吸収
leader skill.name: 混沌神の奪魂

60624.name: 獄竜魔ヴァルフェード

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で毒・呪いを発生する効果を付与
bb.name: ダークベノム

dictionary.description: A demon engulfed in mysterious intentions. Near the crater where Bariura had once stood, the knight and queen's party finally managed to outnumber the demon and the dragon during their last decisive battle. However, as the disciples came after Borgeus, he poured his incredible power into the ancient dragon. When the Phoenix Knight struck the dragon with all his might, it created an anomaly that distorted space within the crater. It is said that at that very moment, Borgeus exclaimed "My purpose has been fulfilled!" as he laughed with great pride.
dictionary.evolution:
Human, you have restored my true form.
Are you prepared for this?
You shall also follow my path!
dictionary.fusion:
My desire has been almost fulfilled!
The swelling of this strange power
shall open a new gate!
dictionary.summon:
That knight was the key.
It seems that a similar power
lies dormant within this world.

leader skill.desc: 確率でＨＰを少し吸収＆全属性の弱点属性ダメージを大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 混沌神の蹂躙

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１７連ダメージ＆３ターン、自分の防御力に応じて攻撃力をかなりアップ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で毒・呪いを発生する効果を付与
sbb.name: レクス・モルトゥオルム

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１５連ダメージ
bb.name: 天狼滅牙

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが少ないほど、攻撃力を大幅にアップ＆スパーク時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: 剣神

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性３０連ダメージ
bb.name: 漸毅狼影陣

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが少ないほど、攻撃力を大幅にアップ＆スパーク時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: 剣神

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１７連ダメージ
bb.name: 天狼滅牙・極

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが少ないほど、攻撃力を大幅にアップ＆スパーク時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: 強き魂を持つ者

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性３２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数を増加
sbb.name: 漸毅狼影陣・極

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性９連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: 王呪刀・朧月

dictionary.description: A sword blacksmith from the Agni Empire. He lived during the time when the war with the gods was at its peak, a blessed time for any blacksmith indeed. He went through any means possible to test the quality of his work. One of them was to wield the blades he had forged himself while contemplating the true meaning of the sword. Legend has it that he would slay many monsters alongside his apprentice, for he was a rare individual of amazing skill, capable of both wielding and forging a blade.
dictionary.fusion:
Don't interfere with my work!
Or else I'll test my blades
on you first!
dictionary.summon:
What do you have on you?
You have a sword? Unsheathe it.
What's wrong with you? Move it!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 王者の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１１連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージをかなり増加
bb.name: 皇崩刀・天凱

dictionary.description: A sword blacksmith from the Agni Empire. It is said that once the war with the gods began, he lost his family to the God Army. His mentality completely changed after this, leading him to research divine weapons in order to create ones capable of slaying the gods. Being a swordsman as well, he tested his countless blades by fighting in the frontlines of the battlefield. It is said that those who witnessed this battle-hungry demon fight believed he was neither Zergel the blacksmith, nor Zergel the swordsman.
dictionary.evolution:
This technique...
All right, I'll light the furnace.
It's time to make a better sword.
dictionary.fusion:
I can never erase
that image from my mind...
Curse you, gods!
dictionary.summon:
I will slay all the gods.
That is my only wish!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１５連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
bb.name: 神滅刀・神薙

dictionary.description: A sword blacksmith from the Agni Empire. It is said that after some time the weapons he had forged could no longer be distinguished from the ones originally made by the gods. However, this did not satisfy him, and he continued to collect divine weapons for research as he cut down the gods he met on the battlefield. Not much is known of the last stages of his life, but it is rumored that he lost his life to one of his own masterpieces. Some say this was the penalty he faced for undeservingly using godly techniques.
dictionary.evolution:
No! It's still not enough!
I can't be satisfied with this!
My blades must be sharper! Stronger!
dictionary.fusion:
These blades are still not enough...
Summoner, get me more.
You can do that, can't you?
dictionary.summon:
I gave everything up
to forge my blades in order to
cut down the gods someday!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を４０％アップ＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
leader skill.name: 統神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で弱体を発生する効果を付与・攻撃力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: 神魔必滅・神薙真打

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性９連ダメージ＆３ターン、ターン終了時に追加ダメージ
bb.name: ダンピール

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、確率でＢＢゲージを少し増加・ダメージを５０％アップ＆全属性の弱点属性ダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 魂血神の葬架

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１３連ダメージ＆３ターン、ターン終了時に追加ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ
sbb.name: ブラッド・キャスク

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１３連ダメージ＆３ターン、ターン終了時に追加ダメージ
bb.name: クルースニク

extra skill.desc: 弱点属性ダメージをアップ
extra skill.name: エターナルダークネス

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、確率でＢＢゲージを増加・ダメージを７５％アップ＆全属性の弱点属性ダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 魂狩神の葬棺

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１６連ダメージ＆３ターン、ターン終了時に追加ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ
sbb.name: フェイタル・ロスト

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な闇属性２０連ダメージ＆３ターン、ターン終了時に強力な追加ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージを超絶アップ
ubb.name: クルーサフィクション

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力をアップ
bb.name: クラスタースパイン

dictionary.description: A disciple who once served the Holy Emperor Karna Masta. According to legend, she was the Holy Emperor's most trusted disciple and was adored by a multitude of gods. However, one day she suddenly left Karna Masta's side for reasons that remain unknown. Many possible reasons have been discussed, but since there are accounts that state she fought another high ranking god afterwards, it is most commonly believed that she betrayed Karna Masta out of pure self-interest. This clashes completely with previous records regarding her conduct and attitude though, and therefore this theory is still disputed today.
dictionary.fusion:
My wishes matter not.
I am a being of destruction.
I only serve to invite misfortune.
dictionary.summon:
A Summoner?
How nostalgic.
Oh, don't mind me.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの閃光

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力をアップ
bb.name: ネビュラグラス

dictionary.description: A former disciple of the Holy Emperor Karna Masta. It had long been believed that Feeva was a being that had brought upon destruction. Even tales claiming she had set a trap on various gods surfaced, but these were all erased as heretical pieces time and again. One of the main reasons why she was thought to be destructive was due to the myths that tell she was sealed away for committing a heinous crime. Though the details are few and unclear, apparently she savagely attacked a higher ranking god in a manner deemed completely inappropriate for a disciple of the Holy Emperor.
dictionary.evolution:
It seems my powers were sealed away
while I was unconscious.
How utterly pitiful.
dictionary.fusion:
I expect nothing from humans.
However,
I expect nothing from gods either.
dictionary.summon:
A world with order.
I wonder how many within it know
the sacrifices required to achieve that.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの波動

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性２５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ
sbb.name: オブシディアンスタブ

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性２８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力をアップ
bb.name: ネビュラマグナ

dictionary.description: A former disciple of the Holy Emperor Karna Masta who was sealed in Ishgria. Finding herself sealed within a barrier and with her fellow peers battling each other, Feeva did not fight against them, but instead chose to conserve her power. After the disciples had been battling for a long time, the high ranking god that sought to destroy them finally appeared. This prompted her to finally release her true power, as if she had somehow been expecting this to happen. Thanks to Feeva's well-timed intervention, the god failed in destroying the Six Pillars, managing to only seal them away for good.
dictionary.evolution:
I need to return to that world!
There are still things I must do there!
dictionary.fusion:
You have my thanks.
Heh, who would have thought I'd be able
to speak to someone this freely again.
dictionary.summon:
Certain fear.
Certain malice.
I swear to overcome it all!

extra skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを回復＆ＨＰを少し吸収
extra skill.name: 生命の恵み

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 闘神の波動

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性３６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ
sbb.name: オブシディアンレイド

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な闇属性２２連ダメージ＆＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力を大幅にアップ
ubb.name: フェラス・アスタロト

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: キュアリジェクト

dictionary.description: One of the sacred Guardians of Meirith, who worshipped the Holy Emperor Karna Masta in the La Veda Republic. A genius sorceress, and Themis's younger sister. Disliking being antagonized by her overconfident sister, she kept her talents well hidden until she was suddenly appointed as a Guardian. Within the Guardians there were many who had little interest in their environment or any other gods besides Karna Masta, but Ivris is said to have been unusually uninterested in her surroundings.
dictionary.fusion:
Please stop this...
What you're doing now
serves no purpose...
dictionary.summon:
No! Forget about it!
I'm no good!
So just get away from me!

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効
leader skill.name: 蒼穹の神風

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: キュアインヴェイド

dictionary.description: One of the sacred Guardians of Meirith. When she was appointed as one of the Guardians, an oracle revealed that the group would have to travel to Ishgria in order to destroy invading demons. Putting her life on the line, she left her home without hesitation, almost as if she were running away from her sister. She arrived to Ishgria with a big smile on her face, and released a powerful magical force within her. It is said that Ivris had turned into a completely different person, destroying demons one after the other.
dictionary.evolution:
My sister's not here...?
Are you sure...?
I'll do my very best then!!
dictionary.fusion:
Give me more, please!
I can still take more!
Oh my, have I turned greedy?
dictionary.summon:
Looks like even if I go all out here,
I won't be in trouble!
I mean, since my sister's not around!

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効＆ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復・ＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 永遠の息吹

sbb.desc: 味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加＆味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
sbb.name: ジュエルアルキュミア

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: キュアカタストロフ

dictionary.description: One of the sacred Guardians of Meirith. As soon as she learned that Karna Masta was being targeted, she decided to stay behind in Ishgria without a moment's hesitation. And though most of her comrades smiled bitterly at her decision, Fadahl was the only one to treat her kindly. She then entrusted him with a letter meant for her sister Themis, though Fadahl would prove unable to deliver it to her. Even so, Ivris faced the demons of Ishgria with the same resolution she had shown before, all in order to protect her beloved family.
dictionary.evolution:
Having the will to protect someone
is more important than having talent.
But you knew that, right?
dictionary.fusion:
You're very kind...
Almost as kind as my elder sister.
Can I spoil you a little? Hehe.
dictionary.summon:
I'll protect my family, always!
I may not get along with my sister,
but it's not like I hate her!

extra skill.desc: ＨＰが２０％以下の時、一度だけ戦闘不能を耐える
extra skill.name: 守りたいもの

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効＆ターン毎にＨＰを回復・ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 永遠の命輝

sbb.desc: 味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加＆味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
sbb.name: クリスタルアルキュミア

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な闇属性２２連ダメージ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆ランダムで２回、一度だけ戦闘不能を耐える効果を付与
ubb.name: ニルヴァーナ

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性７連ダメージ＆確率で防御力を１ターン低下
bb.name: イビルブレス

dictionary.description: A demonic beast composed of parts taken from many different creatures. Since it seems improbable that this type of creature is born in Ishgria's natural habitat, many speculate that it is the creation of another demon who used various parts of different creatures to bring it to life. The Bilmera's cry renders its opponents unable to move, allowing it to quickly devour their souls. However, having so many brains attached to its body sometimes throws the Bilmera into a wild confusion, causing it to lose control over its own power. Some of these creatures have been known to wait for their end while in this state.
dictionary.fusion:
This won't suffice.
We still have much to achieve
before reaching our final form.
dictionary.summon:
You want me to help you?
If you bring me fresh souls,
I may consider it.

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの気勢

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性９連ダメージ＆確率で防御力を１ターン大幅に低下
bb.name: ハザードブレス

dictionary.description: A demonic beast composed of parts taken from many different creatures. Converting the spirit of its prey into revitalizing energy to strengthen its own demonic powers, the Baldeura roams the lands in search of fresh souls to consume. However, due to the enormous power it holds in its evolved form, it tends to lose control over itself. For this reason, some consider the Baldeura's ferocity as its own attempt to resist something within itself.
dictionary.evolution:
GRAAAAAAAH...
After bathing in so much evil energy,
I am a step closer to my final form.
dictionary.fusion:
Fresh souls are exceptional.
However, we cannot be satisfied
with this amount alone.
dictionary.summon:
In order to summon us,
a great deal of courage is needed.
Will you let us enjoy ourselves?

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの気勢

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性６連ダメージ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復
bb.name: レーヴアルクス

dictionary.description: A female archer from the Bariura Empire who lived during the time of the great war against the gods. Though Lymle was initially just a foot soldier, she was suddenly scouted by dark magician Shida and added to the squadron directly under his supervision. She grew to admire Shida very much because of this, though she was unaware that the squadron she had joined was one which dealt with the testing of various demonic weapons. Shortly afterwards, Lymle was scheduled to take part in a certain experiment when she suddenly disappeared. Some speculate that she deserted her squadron once she found out its true purpose, while others say she disappeared due to a mishap during an experimental procedure.
dictionary.fusion:
Wh-What an amazing technique!
I'm overflowing with power.
It really resembles his style!
dictionary.summon:
E-Excuse me... Where am I?
And who are you?
What? A Summoner...?

leader skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを少し回復
leader skill.name: 闇夜の夢

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復
bb.name: レヴァリーアルクス

dictionary.description: A female archer from the Bariura Empire who lived during the time of the great war against the gods. After her mysterious disappearance, her whereabouts were confirmed in the mysterious land of Ishgria. It is believed that she moved from region to region conducting land surveys, but no written accounts that can support this claim have been found thus far. However, evolved versions of the demonic weapons she had obtained from Shida have been discovered in Ishgria, leading many to believe that she continued doing research on the subject there as well.
dictionary.evolution:
I've become even stronger...
And my demon bow is in top shape too!
I hope he praises me for this...
dictionary.fusion:
Thank you so much!
Please, make me even stronger!
I still have a long way to go!
dictionary.summon:
Oh no, I wound up in a strange place.
But if I conduct a land survey here
he may be really happy with me!

leader skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを回復
leader skill.name: 常闇の夢想

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性８連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを増加＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: ネクロアラウンド

dictionary.description: The younger brother of quite a powerful demon. Whilst fighting against his powerful older brother, half of his power was sealed away. The reason behind their battle remains unknown, but the havoc that the siblings' fight brought about engulfed a multitude of demons, causing great destruction in Ishgria. Seeing no end to the fighting, the two brothers agreed to reconcile. However, the eldest had plotted against his little brother, sealing Aaron's powers into countless crystal shards that he scattered around Ishgria.
dictionary.fusion:
Give me more power. I must
become stronger than my brother
so I can leave a legacy behind me!
dictionary.summon:
Do you have any siblings?
It doesn't matter.
I will lend you my power, outsider.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の加護

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性１１連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを増加＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: ネクロスフィア

dictionary.description: A demon who wandered about seeking shards containing the power he had lost. In order to remove the seal his older brother had placed on his powers, Aaron set off on a journey. After uncovering some of the crystals which held his imprisoned power, he began to grow stronger anew, though his desire to fight had somehow begun to fade away. As Aaron began to question the meaning of battle while he continued his efforts to remove the seal, it is said that his resentment against his older brother also began to fade away.
dictionary.evolution:
Compared to fighting,
avoiding a fight is more difficult.
Keep fighting until you learn that.
dictionary.fusion:
My power is not growing...
I'm simply regaining what I lost...
Don't think this in vain...
dictionary.summon:
A grave error helped me grow.
Are you learning from your mistakes?
Or are you just rotting away?

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力を４０％アップ＆確率で被ダメージを２０％軽減
leader skill.name: 統神の加護

sbb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１３連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減＆３ターン、防御力をアップ
sbb.name: ケイオス・アイソレイト

bb.desc: 敵単体に闇属性１５連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを増加＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: ネクロイルシオン

dictionary.description: A demon who lost his will to fight. After exploring region after region in search of a way to rid himself of the seal placed upon him, Aaron had far exceeded the original limits of his power. It is believed the deeds he had to undertake throughout his journey to find the crystal shards holding his power only served to make him even stronger than before. However, having lost any interest in fighting his older brother yet again, Aaron sought to leave Ishgria behind. No records are left depicting any information on the outcome of his journey though, so many speculate that something must have happened to him before he could leave the region.
dictionary.evolution:
To think that I'd regain my strength
after sealing and denying my power...
What an ironic world...
dictionary.fusion:
I like your honest actions.
If I could've done the same, things
might've turned out differently...
dictionary.summon:
The world will keep spinning anyway.
So, is power really necessary?
Is there no escape...?

extra skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
extra skill.name: 失われし半身

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力を４０％アップ＆確率で被ダメージを２０％軽減＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 統神の究護

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１８連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減＆３ターン、防御力をアップ
sbb.name: ケイオス・ディヴァイド

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な闇属性２０連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを超絶増加＆味方全体に３ターン、被ダメージを１/４に軽減・ターン毎にＢＢゲージを超絶増加
ubb.name: 冥刻輪廻

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性８連ダメージ（ダメージの一部を吸収）＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をアップ
bb.name: ・・・あっちいって・・・

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが多いほど、攻撃力をアップ
leader skill.name: 剣豪の覇気

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１２連ダメージ（ダメージの一部を吸収）＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をアップ
bb.name: 一人でできるし！

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが多いほど、攻撃力をアップ
leader skill.name: 剣豪の覇気

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージを少しアップ＆２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: ソウルスラッシュ

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力・防御力を１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 鋼の仁魂

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをアップ＆２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: アーデントソウルスラッシュ

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力・防御力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 黒鋼の仁魂

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをアップ＆２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: ソウルエクスキューション

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力・防御力を２０％アップ＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
leader skill.name: 神鋼の仁魂

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: マリスレヴナント

dictionary.description: A necromancer who once fought against the gods alongside the Oracle Knight. Yuura served the Bariura Empire, where his powers were well recognized, but grew tired and bored of all the power struggles happening within the country. One day, he was ordered by his junior, who had ironically become his superior, to assassinate the Oracle Knight and Maiden. Since his specialty was death, he had discarded the gods as powerless beings long ago. Therefore, he did not think much of those who served the gods, and accepted the mission with little to no hesitation.
dictionary.fusion:
What's with the face? Necromancers
are way more honest than your kind.
Oh, did that make you mad?
dictionary.summon:
That's too bad.
Summoning me, I mean. Well,
I guess that's what they call fate.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: グリーフレヴナント

dictionary.description: While he observed the Oracle Knight and Maiden, he learned that their goal was to defeat the gods. Yuura didn't think twice before discarding all of his loyalty towards the Bariura Empire for a chance to join the Oracle Knight in his quest. The Oracle Maiden accepted him without any trace of hesitation, the rest of the group wasn't as accepting of him. The Maiden's childhood friends were particularly harsh on him, though Yuura always managed to reply in kind with a sarcasm that infuriated the two ladies. It is said that the Oracle Maiden always laughed as she watched Yuura and her friends' exchanges.
dictionary.evolution:
Even with talent and effort,
sometimes things are impossible.
But you'll still grow anyway, right?
dictionary.fusion:
Oh, your face is starting to look
better! It looks almost as good
as the face of my dead souls!
dictionary.summon:
She was weak but strong,
and strong but weak. It was funny.
Are you gonna show me some fun too?

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を４０％アップ＆確率でＨＰを少し吸収
leader skill.name: 狩統神の力

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な闇属性１８連ダメージ＆３ターン、ターン終了時に強力な追加ダメージ＆自分のＢＢゲージを満タンにする
sbb.name: 忌魂呪式『ディシール』

bb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: ヴィシャスレヴナント

dictionary.description: In the midst of the fight against the gods, Yuura fell in battle, losing his life whilst trying to protect one of his comrades. The reason why this course of action of his has not been studied in greater detail is perhaps due to the great amount of people who attested to seeing him rise again from the dead, fighting until his body had disintegrated. Yuura, who transcended death even if for a brief moment, revealed to the Oracle Knight that he had once been entrusted to kill him. Simultaneously, he also created an opening to land a fatal blow against the god who meant to destroy humanity.
dictionary.evolution:
Hey, you sure hung in there.
Now leave the rest to me.
I'll beat your enemies for you.
dictionary.fusion:
Ha ha ha! Your face is so funny!
No, that was a compliment!
Don't get mad! I'm serious!
dictionary.summon:
Even though she was so full of doubt
she still did her best for her
friends. What a piece of work.

extra skill.desc: ＢＢゲージが満タン時、攻撃力をかなりアップ
extra skill.name: 死を越えし意志

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を８０％アップ＆ＨＰを少し吸収

sbb.name: 屍魂呪式『エルドローブ』

leader skill.name: 紫浄の闇風

sbb.name: マレヴォレントオンスロート

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: ノクス・マキナ

dictionary.description: A scientist from a technologically advanced world who researched weapons to further the human body's functions. Later on he would prove successful in creating the Six Armor series, but would eventually lose his life to the self-evolving "No. 6" installment of the same series after the machine went berserk. Shortly afterwards No. 5 was also destroyed, while other installments of the Six Armors, and even his younger sister, disappeared from the world. However, in the end he was brought back to life by the self-timed repair mechanisms he had installed inside his own body.
dictionary.fusion:
Fusion differs from evolution.
The process takes a long time,
but it must be necessary to evolve.
dictionary.summon:
I have no interest in you,
but I am curious about your power.
Now hurry up and get it over with.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の霊力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: ゾーク・マキナ

dictionary.description: A scientist from another world who developed the Six Armors series. After being resurrected within a world in ruins, Reis headed towards a gate connected to countless worlds that had spawned from all the destruction. Once he felt the power of the Six Armors emanating from Ishgria, he flung himself into the gate that led towards it while sending a special device into a different gate. It is believed this was his way of atoning for the loss of his younger sister, who might have wandered into another world once she thought him dead.
dictionary.evolution:
I see! So this is evolution!
Come, I need your help!
I need to reach the next level!
dictionary.fusion:
Fusion is a slow, but surefire
process, and that's not a bad thing.
It still yields results.
dictionary.summon:
Without talent I could've led a
normal life. That means talent
isn't connected to happiness.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆クリティカル時、ＢＢゲージをかなり増加・ダメージをかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 閃翔の霊刃

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ・クリティカルダメージをアップ
sbb.name: ハザードスウィープ

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を超絶アップ
bb.name: プロヴィデンス・マキナ

dictionary.description: A scientist from another world who developed the Six Armors series. Reis continued searching for his own creation in Ishgria as he battled hordes of incoming demons. However, once he found it, he was extremely disappointed, for his creation was far weaker than he had hoped. Thus, he searched for a demon to help him create a new mechanical puppet. Since Reis was nevertheless a mortal, he wanted his creation bent on evolving to gain power to have a worthy opponent it could fight until the end of time.
dictionary.evolution:
You did the right thing.
Evolution is humanity's true nature.
Even if it leads nowhere!
dictionary.fusion:
Now you get it, don't you?
The happiness one feels when watching
our own creations grow stronger.
dictionary.summon:
I have a human heart too.
And he's not such a bad guy.
Though he wasn't a genius like me.

extra skill.desc: クリティカルダメージをかなりアップ
extra skill.name: 六鎧への執念

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆クリティカル時、ＢＢゲージを大幅に増加・ダメージを大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 閃翔の霊覇刃

sbb.name: ディーサイドスウィフト

ubb.name: デミアージュ

bb.name: フォーリーラプス

dictionary.description: A Summoner who joined the Akras Summoners' Hall not long after its establishment. Though she was a scientist who studied the demonic arts in the Randall Empire, it is unclear as to how she came to join Summoners' Hall, since the only information available from such times is full of ambiguity. Having been born into a long line of talented magicians, once she joined the Hall she explored Grand Gaia and found ancient texts about the demonic arts, unlocking a myriad of lost knowledge from them. She is also known to have continuously quarreled with the commander of the 7th Squadron of the Demon Slayers, and was often reprimanded by Grahdens for it.
dictionary.fusion:
No need to be so tense.
You'll get used to it.
You're naughty too, aren't you? Hehe.
dictionary.summon:
Oh-oh. You summoned me?
Okay, I gotcha.
The great Kafka will lend you a hand!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与・被ダメージ時、確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生する効果を付与
bb.name: フォーリークライム

dictionary.description: The former commander of the now defunct 6th Squadron of the Demon Slayers. As Kafka surveyed the region of Bariura, she exhumed many research materials left behind by the Bariura Empire. She was even able to gain many materials specifically from old facilities that researched demonic techniques, and saw her power grow along with her findings. It is thanks to the knowledge she acquired, as well as that of Rhoa, that the Summoners' Research Lab was able to be established. However, the bad blood the feud between the two different squadrons created still survives there in the form of cliques.
dictionary.evolution:
Manipulating the spirits of the dead
is not something you see everyday.
Can you really handle me?
dictionary.fusion:
All right, fusion complete!
Was it a great success? Maybe super?!
Haha. No pressure, relax.
dictionary.summon:
Aren't people who are both impulsive
and logical just the worst?
That guy's such a head case...

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を４０％アップ＆確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 悪疫神の轟力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与・確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生する効果を付与・最大ＨＰに応じて攻撃力を少しアップ
sbb.name: シュロム＝ノクス

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与・被ダメージ時、確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生する効果を付与
bb.name: フォーリーディザイア

dictionary.description: A Summoner selected to join the covert "Ishgria's Recon Squad." When the squadron suffered the attack of a terrible beast, Rhoa was prepared to sacrifice himself in order to help his comrades escape. However, Kafka saw through his plans, and chose to help him against his will. Though it was the first time the two of them ever fought together, it is said that they made for a pretty good team. However, Kafka's appearance began to change in the middle of the fight, for the knowledge she had gained in Bariura had been of demonic origin after all.
dictionary.evolution:
I think I messed up a little...
I did become stronger, but at this
rate... Use me well, okay?
dictionary.fusion:
Ugh, this is not going well.
Do something about it!
Just kidding, I'll help too.
dictionary.summon:
Argh... So many things are...
Demons are definitely...no joke...
Guess you reap what you sow...

extra skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、確率でＢＢゲージを増加＆状態異常の敵へのダメージを大幅にアップ
extra skill.name: 堕ちた覚醒

leader skill.name: 悪疫統神の轟咆

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、最大ＨＰに応じて攻撃力をアップ・攻撃に光・闇属性を付与・確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生する効果を付与
sbb.name: シュロム＝アングウィス

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な闇属性２２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、全状態異常をランダムに発生する効果を付与・被ダメージ時、全状態異常をランダムに発生する効果を付与
ubb.name: ペルセフォネ

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ・通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数を増加
bb.name: ノーブルクライム

dictionary.description: Wielder of the Sacred Dagger. Legend tells of a family in charge of guarding the Sacred Treasures, to which Charis belonged. It is said that out of all the family members, he was the one most loved by the treasures themselves. It is unclear as to when he became their guardian, but according to myth, he defeated and buried countless demons by himself. However, Charis was quite young when this tale is said to have taken place, and therefore some believe it may be nothing more than mere exaggeration.
dictionary.fusion:
Thanks for making me stronger.
Is a thank you enough though?
I mean, I have to repay you somehow.
dictionary.summon:
Was our meeting fated?
Or was this a devious trap?
Either way, it's nice to meet you...

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数を増加
leader skill.name: 影神の魂操

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ・通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数を増加
bb.name: ノーブルクラヴィス

dictionary.description: Wielder of the Sacred Dagger. There is a legend in Atharva that links the god of death to the guardian of the Sacred Treasures. It claims that whoever acquires knowledge of the treasures is met by a young man who comes from the darkness to pierce their heart. Story has it that a certain god wanted Charis to help keep this information secret from others, though no one knows to what end, nor why Charis did as he was commanded. The only thing that is certain is that the god granted him the Sacred Dagger so that he could carry out his task.
dictionary.evolution:
You evolved me?
That means even more work, right?
Oh, I don't mean it in a bad way!
dictionary.fusion:
You're strengthening me again?
Guess a simple "thanks" isn't enough.
What do you want me to do?
dictionary.summon:
I hate myself for wanting that,
but I just can't stop myself.
I'm a pain, aren't I?

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数を増加＆ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 影昏神の魂歪

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な闇属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数を増加・防御力に応じて攻撃力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: 神影の契約

bb.desc: 敵全体に闇属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ・通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数を増加
bb.name: ノーブルインペリウム

dictionary.description: Wielder of the Sacred Dagger. It has been discovered during recent surveys conducted in Ishgria that even a handful of demons knew of the existence of the Sacred Treasures as well. Though there is evidence suggesting that one of these demons sought to collect all the treasures in order to destroy the world, myth has it that a young man bearing the Sacred Dagger prevented this from happening by giving birth to one nightmare after another. However, no information regarding the successors of Charis's family has been unearthed after this occurrence.
dictionary.evolution:
Err... Umm...
As a thanks to you,
I'll work even harder...
dictionary.fusion:
Thank you...
But when I really think about it,
showing my gratitude is embarrassing.
dictionary.summon:
As the guardian of the Sacred
Treasures, I must fulfill my role.
That should be enough, right?

extra skill.desc: ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ＆与ダメージが一定数を超える度に２ターン、スパークダメージを超絶アップ
extra skill.name: 授けられた才能

leader skill.name: 影霊昏神の創魂
